SA20asmahsbu:327: (Msa 13) atyantāparinirvāṇadharmā tu hetuhīno yasya parinirvāṇagotram eva nāsti /
SA20asmahsbu:329: gāmbhīryāudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktir bhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:330: saṃpattiś cāvasāne dvayagataparamā yad bhavaty eva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisatvaprakṛtiguṇavatas tatprapuṣṭāc ca gotrāt // AMsa_3.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:331: yadgābhīryāudāryavādini parahitakriyārthamukte vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme gāmbhīryāudāryārtham ajñātvaivādhimuktir vipulā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:333: saṃpattiś cāvasāne mahābodhirdvayagatāyāḥ saṃpatteḥ paramā tatprakṛtyā guṇavataḥ paripuṣṭasya ca bodhisatvagotrasya māhātmyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:334: dvayagatā iti dvaye laukikāḥ śrāvakāś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:338: svaparahitasukhakriyāphalatvād bhavati samudagrasamūlam udagragotram etat // AMsa_3.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:339: svaparahitaphalasya bodhivṛkṣasya praśastamūlatvam anena bodhisatvagotraṃ saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:350: (Msa 14) so 'yaṃ trividho guṇāḥ paridīpitaḥ puruṣakāraguṇo dvābhyāṃ padābhyām arthakriyāguṇaḥ phalaparigrahaguṇaś ca dvābhyāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:352: iti triguṇā dvayālambanā ca cetanā cittotpāda ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:367: sadā pāramitāyoganiryāṇaś ca sa kathyate // AMsa_4.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:371: kiṃmūla eṣa caturvidho bodhisatvānāṃ cittotpādaḥ kimāśayaḥ kimadhimokṣaḥ kimālambanaḥ kiṃyānaḥ kiṃpratiṣṭhaḥ kimādīnavaḥ kimanuśaṃsaḥ kiṃniryāṇaḥ kiṃparyavasāna iti /
SA20asmahsbu:386: yasyāṃ bhūmau yaḥ prayuktas tasya tadbhūmiparyavasānaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:391: yo hi parākhyānāc cittotpādaḥ paravijñāpanāt sa ucyate samādānasāṃketikaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:392: sa punar mitrabalād vā bhavati kalyāṇamitrānurodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:395: chrutabalād vā tatra tatra dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bahūnāṃ bodhicittotpādāt /
SA20asmahsbu:396: śubhābhyāsād vā dṛṣṭa iva dharme satataśravaṇodgrahaṇadhāraṇādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:401: dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve /
SA20asmahsbu:404: kauśalyaṃ pariśiṣṭe niryāṇaṃ caiva vijñeyam // AMsa_4.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:406: dhyānamaye sukhagarbhe karuṇā saṃvardhikā dhātrī // AMsa_4.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:410: āśayaśuddhir jñeyā kauśalyaṃ tv anyabhūmigatam // AMsa_4.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:414: sa ca pāramārthikaś cittotpādaḥ pramuditāyāṃ bhūmāv iti /
SA20asmahsbu:418: satvakṛtyeṣu samacittatā ātmana iva teṣāṃ duḥkhakṣayākāṅkṣaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:420: tasminn eva ca pāramārthikacottotpāde ṣaḍarthā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:421: janma audāryam utsāha āśayaśuddhiḥ pariśiṣṭakauśalyaṃ niryāṇaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:428: kathaṃ manasikāreṇa tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanājñānāt kalpanāmātram etad iti /
SA20asmahsbu:441: meghasadṛśaś ca kathitaś cittotpādo jinātmajānāṃ hi /
SA20asmahsbu:442: tasmāt tathā guṇāḍhyaṃ cittaṃ muditaiḥ samutpādyam // AMsa_4.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:444: āśayasahagataś ca cittotpādaḥ kalyāṇasuvarṇasadṛśo hitasukhādhyāśayasya vikārābhajanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:471: mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tat sukham // AMsa_4.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:472: tena cittotpādena varjitāḥ satvāś caturvidhaṃ sukhaṃ na labhante yad bodhisatvānāṃ parārthacintanāt sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:475: yac ca paramatvasya dharmanairātmyasya saṃdarśanāt sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:477: sahodayāc cittavarasya dhīmataḥ susaṃvṛtaṃ cittam anantaduṣkṛtāt /
SA20asmahsbu:478: sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluś ca vivardhanadvayam // AMsa_4.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:479: tasya cittavarasya sahodayāt bodhisatvasya susaṃvṛtaṃ cittaṃ bhavaty anantasatvādhiṣṭhānād (Msa 18)
SA20asmahsbu:480: duṣkṛtād ato 'sya durgatito bhayaṃ na bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:481: sa ca dvayaṃ vardhayan śubhaṃ ca karma kṛpā ca nityaṃ ca śubhī bhavati kṛpāluś ca tena ca sadā modate /
SA20asmahsbu:486: yad ānapekṣaḥ svaśarīrajīvite parārtham abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
SA20asmahsbu:487: paroghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravatsyati // AMsa_4.23 //
SA20asmahsbu:488: asya piṇḍārtho yasya para eva priyataro nātmā parārthaṃ svaśarīrajīvite ānapekṣatvāt abhyeti paraṃ pariśramam /
SA20asmahsbu:489: sa katham ātmārthaṃ paroghātena duṣkṛte karmaṇi pravatsyatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:491: māyopamān vīkṣya sa sarvadharmān udyānayātrām iva copapattīḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:492: kleśāc ca duḥkhāc ca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle // AMsa_4.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:493: svakā guṇāḥ satvahitāc ca modaḥ saṃcintyajanma rddhivikurvitaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:494: vibhūṣaṇaṃ bhojanam agrabhūmiḥ krīḍāratir nityakṛpātmakānām // AMsa_4.25 //
SA20asmahsbu:495: māyopamasarvadharmalakṣaṇāt sa bodhisatvaḥ saṃpattikāle kleśebhyo na bibheti /
SA20asmahsbu:503: parārtham udyogavataḥ kṛpātmano hy avīcir apy eti yato 'sya ramyatām /
SA20asmahsbu:504: kutaḥ punas trasyati tādṛśo bhavan parāśrayair duḥkhasamudbhavair bhave // AMsa_4.26 //
SA20asmahsbu:505_0: api ca yasya parārtham udyogavataḥ karuṇātmatvād avīcir apy ramyaḥ sa kathaṃ parārthanimittair
SA20asmahsbu:505_1: duḥkhotpādair bhave punas trāsam āpatsyate yato 'sya duḥkhatrāsaḥ syāc cittasya vyāvṛttir bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:508: parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā // AMsa_4.27 //
SA20asmahsbu:510: yasya mahākaruṇācāryeṇa nityoṣito ātmā paraduḥkhaiś ca duḥkhitaṃ cetas tasyotpanne parārthaṃ karaṇīye yadi paraiḥ samādāpanā kartavyā bhavati atilajjanā /
SA20asmahsbu:512: śirasi vinihitoccasatvabhāraḥ śithilagatir na hi śobhate 'grasatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:513: svaparavividhabandhanātibaddhaḥ śataguṇam utsaham arhati prakartum // AMsa_4.28 //
SA20asmahsbu:514_0: śirasi mahāntaṃ satvabhāraṃ vinidhāya bodhisatvaḥ śithilaṃ parākramamāṇo na śobhate
SA20asmahsbu:514_1: śataguṇaṃ hi sa vīryaṃ kartum arhati śrāvakavīryāt tathā hi svaparavavidhair vividhair
SA20asmahsbu:529: tathātmano 'nyārthaviśiṣṭasaṃjñinaḥ svakārthatā kā katamā parārthatā // AMsa_5.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:530: paratrātmasamānacittatāṃ labdhvā 'dhimuktito vā sāṃketikacittotpādalābhe jñānato vā pāramārthikacittotpādalābhe /
SA20asmahsbu:531: ātmato vā punaḥ paratra viśiṣṭatarām iṣṭatāṃ labdhvā tenaiva ca kāraṇenātmanaḥ parārthe viśiṣṭasaṃjñino bodhisatvasya (Msa 20)
SA20asmahsbu:535: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇā ripau /
SA20asmahsbu:536: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate // AMsa_5.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:537: yathā svātmanaḥ parārtho viśiṣyate tat sādhayati parārtham ātmano 'tyarthaṃ saṃtāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:540: vinītir arthe paripācanā śubhe tathāvavādasthitibuddhimuktayaḥ // AMsa_5.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:541: guṇair viśiṣṭaiḥ samudāgamas tathā kulodayo vyākaraṇābhiṣiktatā /
SA20asmahsbu:542: tathāgatajñānam anuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ // AMsa_5.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:543: trividhe satvanikāye hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭagotrasthe trayodaśavidho bodhisatvasya parārthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:553: aṣṭamyāṃ bhūbhau vyākaraṇaṃ daśamyām abhiśekaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:554: saha tathāgatajñānenety eṣa triṣu gotrastheṣu yathāyogaṃ trayodaśavidhaḥ parārtho bodhisatvasya /
SA20asmahsbu:557: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā 'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattir uttamā // AMsa_5.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:558: yathā 'sau parārthapratipattiḥ saṃpannā bhavati tathā saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:563: na ṛddhā manyate na cāvatāritān satvān mamāyati /
SA20asmahsbu:569: na hy adūragatayā pratipattyā kulodayādayaḥ pareṣāṃ kartuṃ śakyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:573: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:574: pratisvam ādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhigame kṛpātmakaḥ // AMsa_5.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:575: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārtham udyataḥ sadā tad aprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām /
SA20asmahsbu:576: sadā tu dhīro hi parārtham udyato dvayārtham ādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim // AMsa_5.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:578: calaṃ viparyāsasukhaṃ rūparūpyabhavapriyāṇām anityatvāt paramārthaduḥkhatvāc ca saṃskāraduḥkhatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:580: vimūḍho janaḥ sadā svasukhārthaṃ pratipannaḥ sukhaṃ nāpnoti duḥkham evāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:581: bodhisatvas tu parārthaṃ pratipannaḥ svaparārthaṃ saṃpādya nirvṛtisukhaṃ prāpnoty ayam asyāparaḥ pratipattiviśeṣaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:583: yathā yathā hy akṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:584: tathā tathā yuktasamānatāpadair hitāya satveṣv abhisaṃskaroti tat // AMsa_5.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:585: yena yena prakāreṇa cakṣurādīndriyagocare vicitre bodhisatvaḥ pravartate /
SA20asmahsbu:586: īryāpathavyāpāracāre vartamānas tena tena prakāreṇa saṃbaddhasādṛśyavacanair hitārthaṃ satveṣu tat sarvam abhisaṃskaroti /
SA20asmahsbu:589: sadā 'svatantrīkṛtadoṣacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti buddhimān /
SA20asmahsbu:590: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ // AMsa_5.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:591: sadā kleśair asvatantrīkṛtacetane jane na saṃdoṣam upaiti bodhisatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:596: vividhaguṇagaṇair vivardhamānā jagad upaguhya sadā kṛpāśayena // AMsa_5.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:598: abhibhavamāhātmyaṃ sakalaṃ bhavatrayaṃ gatiṃ ca pañcavidhām abhibhayagamanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:600: rūpaṃ cet subhūta bhāvo 'bhaviṣyan nābhāvā nadaṃ mahāyānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuralokam abhibhūya niryāsyatīti vistaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:607: na san na cāsan na tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608: na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punar viśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇaṃ // AMsa_6.1 //
SA20asmahsbu:614: na jāyate na ca vyety anabhisaṃskṛtatvād dharmadhātoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:615: na hīyate na ca vardhate saṃkleśavyavadānapakṣayor nirodhotpāde tadavasthatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:616: na viśudhyati prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt na ca na viśudhyati āgantukopakleśavigamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:617: ity etat pañcavidham advayalakṣaṇaṃ paramārthalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:619: na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayam ātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:620: dvayān na cānyad bhrama eṣa tatūditas tataś ca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ // AMsa_6.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:624: tathā hi sā vilakṣaṇā ātmalakṣaṇāt parikalpitāt /
SA20asmahsbu:626: nāpy ato dvayād anyad ātmalakṣaṇam upapadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:628: bhrama eṣa tūtpanno yeyam ātmadṛṣṭis tasmād eva cātmābhāvān mokṣo 'pi bhramamātrasaṃkṣayo veditavyo na tu kaścin muktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:630: kathaṃ jano vibhramamātram āśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām /
SA20asmahsbu:631: avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ // AMsa_6.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:633: tamaḥ prakāraḥ katamo 'yam īdṛśo yato 'vipaśyan sadasan nirīkṣate // AMsa_6.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:634: kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ loko bhrāntimātram ātmadarśanaṃ niśritya satatānubaddhaṃ duḥkhasvabhāvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ na paśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:640: yadā ca loko bhāvānāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paśyati taṃ taṃ pratyayaṃ pratītya te te bhāvā bhavantīti /
SA20asmahsbu:641: tat katham etāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ śrayate 'nyakāritaṃ darśanādikaṃ na pratītyasamutpannam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:642: katamo 'yam īdṛśas tamaḥprakāro lokasya yad vidyamānaṃ pratītyasamutpādam avipaśyan na vidyamānam ātmānaṃ nirīkṣate /
SA20asmahsbu:643: śakyaṃ hi nāma tamasā vidyamānam adraṣṭuṃ syān na tvavidyamānaṃ draṣṭum iti /
SA20asmahsbu:645: ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanor iha /
SA20asmahsbu:646: tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām // AMsa_6.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:647: na cāsti saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ kiṃcin nānākaraṇaṃ paramārthavṛttyā nairātmyasya samatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:648: tathāpi janmakṣayān mokṣaprāptir bhavaty eva śubhakarmakāriṇāṃ ye mokṣamārgaṃ bhāvayanti /
SA20asmahsbu:650: saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāram anantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:651: dharmeṣu cintāsuviniśriś citatvāj jalpānvayām arthagatiṃ paraiti // AMsa_6.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:653: arthān sa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre /
SA20asmahsbu:654: pratyakṣatām eti ca dharmadhātus tasmād viyukto dvayalakṣaṇena // AMsa_6.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:655: nāstīti cittāt param etya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvam upaiti tasmāt /
SA20asmahsbu:656: dvayasya nāstitvam upetya dhīmān saṃtiṣṭhate 'tadgatidharmaghātau // AMsa_6.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:658: tadāśrayo gahvaradoṣasaṃcayo mahāgadeneva viṣaṃ nirasyate // AMsa_6.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:659: ekena saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratvaṃ dharmacintāsuviniśritatvaṃ samādhiniśrityabhāvanāt manojalpāc ca teṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthaprakhyānāvagamāt tatpraveśaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:661: dvitīyena manojalpamātrānarthān viditvā tadābhāse cittamātre 'vasthānamiyaṃ bodhisatvasya nirvedhabhāgīyāvasthā /
SA20asmahsbu:662: tataḥ pareṇa dharmadhātoḥ pratyakṣato gamane dvayalakṣaṇena viyukto grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇena iyaṃ darśanamārgāvasthā /
SA20asmahsbu:663: tṛtīyena yathāsau dhamadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti tad darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:665: cittād anyadālambanaṃ grāhyaṃ nāstīty avagamya buddhyā tasyāpi cittamātrasya nāstitvāvagamanaṃ grāhyaṃbhāve grāhakābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:666: dvaye cāsya nāstitvaṃ viditvā dharmadhātau avasthānam atadgatir grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇābhyāṃ rahita evaṃ dharmadhātuḥ pratyakṣatām eti /
SA20asmahsbu:668_0: sadā sarvatra samatānugatenāvikalpajñānabalena yatra tatsamatānugataṃ paratantre
SA20asmahsbu:668_1: svabhāve tadāśrayasya dūra-anupraviṣṭasya doṣasaṃcayasya dauṣṭhulyalakṣaṇasya mahāgadeneva viṣasya nirasanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:671: smṛtim agatim avagamya kalpamātrāṃ vrajati guṇārṇavapāramāśudhīraḥ // AMsa_6.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:672_0: buddhavihite sudharme suvyavasthāpite sa paramārthajñānapraviṣṭo bodhisatvaḥ saṃpiṇḍitadharmālambanasya
SA20asmahsbu:672_1: mūlacittasya dharmadhātau matim upanividhāya yā smṛtir upalabhyate tāṃ sarvāṃ smṛtipravṛttiṃ
SA20asmahsbu:672_2: kalpanāmātrām avagacchaty evaṃ guṇārṇavasya pāraṃ buddhatvam āśu vrajatīty etat paramārthajñānasya māhātmyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:679: jñānaṃ hi sarvatragasaprabhedeṣv avyāhataṃ dhīr agataḥ prabhāvaḥ // AMsa_7.1 //
SA20asmahsbu:681: vāci jñānaṃ divyaśrotrābhijñāyāṃ vācaṃ tatra gatvopapannā bhāṣante /
SA20asmahsbu:685: niḥsaraṇe jñānam āsravakṣayābhijñā yathā satvā upapattito niḥsarantīti /
SA20asmahsbu:686: eṣu ṣaṭsvartheṣu sarvatra lokadhātau sapramedeṣu padāparokṣam avyāhataṃ jñānaṃ sa prabhāvo bodhisatvānāṃ ṣaḍabhijñāsaṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:691: yena niśrayeṇa yena jñānena yena manasikāreṇa tasya prabhāvasya samudāgamas tatsaṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:693: yenāryadivyāpratimair vihārair brāhmaiś ca nityaṃ viharaty udāraiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:694: buddhāṃś ca satvāṃś ca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayaty ānayate viśuddhim // AMsa_7.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:696: ātmana āryādisukhavihāram atulyaṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ ca lokadhātvantareṣu gatvā buddhānāṃ pūjanaṃ satvānāṃ viśodhanaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:699: māyopamān paśyati lokadhātūn sarvān sasatvān savivartanāśān /
SA20asmahsbu:700: saṃdarśayaty eva ca tān yatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrair api sa prakāraiḥ // AMsa_7.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:702: svayaṃ ca sarvalokadhātūnāṃ sasatvānāṃ savivartasaṃvartānāṃ māyopamatvadarśanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:709: raśmipramokṣair bhṛśaduḥkhitāṃś ca āpāyikān svargagatān karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:710: mārānvayān kṣubdhavimānaśobhān saṃkampayaṃ srāsayate samārān // AMsa_7.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:716: sakarmajanmottamanirmitaiś ca satvārtham ātiṣṭhati sarvakālam // AMsa_7.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:717: aprameyasamādhivikrīḍitasaṃdarśanāt buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalamadhye trividhena nirmāṇena sadā satvārthakaraṇāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:723: abuddhanāmeṣu ca buddhanāma saṃśrāvaṇāt tān kṣipate 'nyadhātau // AMsa_7.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:727: lokadhātuṣūpapannānāṃ satvānāṃ buddhanāmasaṃśrāvaṇayā prasādaṃ grāhayitvā tadavirahiteṣu lokadhātuṣūpapādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:729: śakto bhavaty eva ca satvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakunir yathaiva /
SA20asmahsbu:730: buddhāt praśaṃsāṃ labhate 'timātrām ādeyavākyo bhavati prajānām // AMsa_7.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:734: ṣaḍdhāpy abhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣā 'bhibhuvas tathā'ṣṭau /
SA20asmahsbu:735: daśāpi kṛtsnāyatanāny ameyāḥ samādhayo dhīragataḥ prabhāvaḥ // AMsa_7.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:738: evaṃ ṣaḍarthena vibhāgalakṣaṇena prabhāvaṃ darśayitvā tanmāhātmyodbhāvanārthaṃ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:739: sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhir jagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam /
SA20asmahsbu:740: parahitakaraṇaikatābhirāmaś carati bhaveṣu hi siṃhavat sudhīraḥ // AMsa_7.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:742: vaśitāmāhātmyaṃ svayaṃ paramajñānavaśitvaprāptyā kleśāsvavaśasya jagataḥ svavaśe sthāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:749: rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvam eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:750: ahāryatāṅgaiḥ samupetatā bhṛśaṃ jinātmaje tatparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.1 //
SA20asmahsbu:752_0: rucir mahāyānadeśanādharme prasādas taddeśike praśamaḥ kleśānām anukampā satveṣu
SA20asmahsbu:752_1: kṣamā duṣkaracaryāyāṃ medhā grahaṇadhāraṇaprativedheṣu prabalatvam adhigame ahāryatā
SA20asmahsbu:754: eṣa samāsena bodhisatvānāṃ navaprakāra ātmaparipāko veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:764: yaś ca tasyāḥ paripāka ugravīryaparārdhaniṣṭhāyuktaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:768: jinātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:769: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:770: guṇajñatā ity api sa bhagavāṃs tathāgata iti vistareṇa kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:775: jīnātmaje kleśavinodanāya tan mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:777: tatparipāko 'pi kāraṇataḥ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:782: kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam /
SA20asmahsbu:784: svaprakṛtyā ca gotreṇa paraduḥkhadarśanena nihīnayānaparivarjanatayā ca paripacyata iti kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:790: dhṛtiḥ sahanaṃ kṣāntir iti paryāyās tatparipāke gotraṃ pratisaṃkhyānaṃ bhāvanā ca kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:795: smṛter mahābuddhyudaye ca yogyatā sumedhatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:797: śrutacintitabhāvitacirakṛtacirabhāṣitānām asaṃmoṣatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitārthasupraviṣṭatā ca smṛter medhāparipākasvabhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:802: tatra puṇyajñānadvayena tasya puṇyajñānadvayasya bījapuṣṭatā tatparipāke kāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:807: punaḥ sadā māranirantarāyatā ahāryatāyāḥ paripākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:810: māranirantarāyatā svabhāvo yadā māro na punaḥ śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:814: jinātmaje hy aṅgasamanvaye punar mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam // AMsa_8.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:819: iti navavidhavas tu pācitātmā paraparipācanayogyatām upetaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:826: vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā /
SA20asmahsbu:831: evaṃ satvānām āśraye vraṇabhojanasthānīye srāvaṇasthānīyaṃ vipakṣaśamanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:836: vipācanoktā paripācanā tathā prapācanā cāpy anupācanāparā /
SA20asmahsbu:837: supācanā cāpy adhipācanā matā nipācanotpācananā ca dehiṣu // AMsa_8.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:850: tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣv api suvyavasthitāḥ // AMsa_8.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:851: tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane /
SA20asmahsbu:852: yathā kṛpātmā parasatvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanātmataḥ // AMsa_8.15 //
SA20asmahsbu:854: yādṛśenāśayena bodhisatvaḥ satvān paripācayati tam āśayaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:856: ātmavatsalas tu loka ātmānaṃ hite ca sukhe ca saṃniyojayati /
SA20asmahsbu:857: avaśiṣṭaiḥ ślokair yena prayogeṇa satvān paripācayati taṃ pāramitāpratipattyā saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:858: yādṛśena dānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:859: na bodhisatvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣv adeyaṃ punar asti sarvathā /
SA20asmahsbu:860: anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samair dānaguṇair na tṛpyate // AMsa_8.16 //
SA20asmahsbu:866: yādṛśena śīlena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:868: paraṃparānugrahakṛt dvidhā pare vipākaniṣyandaguṇena pācakaḥ // AMsa_8.17 //
SA20asmahsbu:881: yādṛśyā kṣāntyā yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:888: saṃparāyānugraheṇa copāyajñas tair apakāramarṣaṇair āvarjyāpakāriṇāṃ kuśale samādāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:889: yādṛśena vīryeṇa yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:890: punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:891: jinātmajaḥ satvagaṇaṃ prapācayan paraikacittasya śubhasya kāraṇāt // AMsa_8.19 //
SA20asmahsbu:895: kuśalacittasaṃniyojanāt dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyānugraheṇeti yādṛśena dhyānena yathā satvān paripācayati tad ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:896: vaśitvam āgamya manasy anuttaraṃ paraṃ samāvarjayate 'tra śāsane /
SA20asmahsbu:897: nihatya sarvām avamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ // AMsa_8.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:898: prāptānuttaravaśitvena dhyānena nirāmiṣeṇa ca nihatasarvāvamānābhilāṣeṇa paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:899: buddhaśāsane parasyāvarjanād āvarjitasya ca kuśaladharmasaṃvardhanāt paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:900: yādṛśyā prajñayā yathā satvān paripācayati tadārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:901: sa tatvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti satvān suvinītasaṃśayān /
SA20asmahsbu:902: tataś ca te tajjinaśāsanād arād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ // AMsa_8.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:903: sa bodhisatvas tatvārthanaye cābhiprāyārthanaye ca suviniścitayā prajñayā paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:907: iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagad akhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisatvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:909: anena yatra ca vinayati sugatigamane yānatraye vā /
SA20asmahsbu:914: yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tatparidīpanāt samāsena paripākamāhātmyaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:915: tatra tanuḥ prakāro 'dhimukticaryābhūmau bodhisatvasya paramo 'ṣṭamyādiṣu vimadhyamaḥ saptasu veditavyaḥ yāval lokasya bhāvas tatsamānayā gatyā atyantam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:925: kṛtvā duṣkaram adbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:926: sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānām iva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhātitā // AMsa_9.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:927: samudāgamataḥ svabhāvata aupamyataś ca buddhatvam udbhāvitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:928: yāvadbhir duṣkaraśatair yāvadbhiḥ kuśalasaṃbhārair yāvatā kālena yāvataḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇasya prahāṇāt samudāgacchatyayaṃ samudāgamaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:932: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva na kaścana /
SA20asmahsbu:933: śukladharmamayaṃ tac ca na ca tais tannirūpyate // AMsa_9.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:936_0: sarvadharmāś ca buddhatvaṃ tathatāyā abhinnatvāt tadviśuddhiprabhāvitatvāc ca buddhatvasya
SA20asmahsbu:936_1: na ca kaś ciddharmo 'sti parikalpitena dharmasvabhāvena śukladharmamayaṃ ca buddhatvaṃ
SA20asmahsbu:937: na ca tais tān nirdiśyate pāramitādīnāṃ pāramitādibhāvenāpariniṣpatter idam advayalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:939: deśanā dharmaratnānāṃ tatprabhavatvāt kuśalasasyānāṃ ca vineyasaṃtānakṣetreṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:940: buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditam atha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūter dharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmaratnākarābham /
SA20asmahsbu:941: bhūtānāṃ śuklasasya prasavasumahato hetuto meghabhūtaṃ dānād dharmāmbuvarṣapratatasuvihitasyākṣayasya prajāsu // AMsa_9.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:942: anena tṛtīyena ślokena tam evārthaṃ nirdiśati /
SA20asmahsbu:943: sumahataḥ pratatasya dharmaratnasya prodbhūter nimittatvād ratnākarābhaṃ bhūtānāṃ mahataḥ śuklasasya prasavahetutvān meghabhūtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:944: mahataḥ suvihitasyākṣayasya dharmāmbuvarṣasya dānāt prajāsv ity ayam atra padavigraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:950: satkāyād dhīnayānāc ca tasmāc charaṇam uttamam // AMsa_9.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:953: yad buddhānubhāvena andhāś cakṣūṃṣi pratilabhante badhirāḥ śrotraṃ vikṣiptacittāḥ svasthacittamītayaḥ śāmyantīty evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:954: apāyaparitrāṇatvaṃ buddhaprabhayā tadgatānāṃ mokṣaṇāt tadagamane ca pratiṣṭhāpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:958: śaraṇam anupamaṃ tacchreṣṭhabuddhatvam iṣṭaṃ jananamaraṇasarvakleśapāpeṣu rakṣā /
SA20asmahsbu:960: anena tṛtīyena tasyaiva śaraṇatvasyānupamaśreṣṭhasya cānuttaryaṃ tenaivārthena darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:961: bauddhair dharmair yac ca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yat saddharme vetti sa satvān pravinetum /
SA20asmahsbu:962: yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭham iha eṣyaṃ śaraṇānām // AMsa_9.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:963: anena caturthena yaiḥ kāraṇais tat tathānuttaraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:965: svārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya saddharmasatvavinayopāyajñānāt karuṇāpāragamanāc ca parārthaniṣṭhām adhikṛtya /
SA20asmahsbu:966: ālokāt kālāt sarvasatvānāṃ buddhatvaṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat /
SA20asmahsbu:968: anena pañcamena ślokena yāvantaṃ kālaṃ yāvatāṃ satvānāṃ yatrārthe śaraṇaṃ bhavati tat samāsena darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:971: kleśajñeyavṛtīnāṃ satatam anugataṃ bījam utkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminn astaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:972: buddhatvaṃ śukladharmapravaraguṇayutā āśrayasyānyathāptis tatprāptir nirvikalpād viṣayasumahato jñānamārgāt suśuddhāt // AMsa_9.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:979: sthitaś ca tasmin sa tathāgato jagan mahācalendrastha ivābhyudīkṣate /
SA20asmahsbu:980: śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghābhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā // AMsa_9.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:982: tatstho hi mahācalendrastha iva dūrāntaranikṛṣṭaṃ lokaṃ paśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:983: dṛṣṭvā ca karuṇāyate śrāvakapratyekabuddhān api prāg eva tadanyān /
SA20asmahsbu:984: pravṛttir ūddhittir avṛtir āśrayo nivṛttir āvṛttir atho dvayādvayā /
SA20asmahsbu:985: samāviśiṣṭā api sarvagātmikā tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttir iṣyate // AMsa_9.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:987: sā hi tathāgatānāṃ parivṛttiḥ parārthavṛttir iti pravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:998: yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tat sarvagataṃ sadāmatam /
SA20asmahsbu:999: yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tat satvagaṇeṣu sarvagam // AMsa_9.15 //
SA20asmahsbu:1000: anena caturthena tatsvabhāvasya buddhatvasya sarvagatatvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1002: satvagaṇeṣu sarvagatatvaṃ buddhatvasyātmatvena sarvasatvopagamane pariniṣpattito veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1004: tatha duṣṭeṣu satveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate // AMsa_9.16 //
SA20asmahsbu:1006: anena pañcamena sarvagatatve 'pyabhājanabhūteṣu satveṣu abuddhabimbadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntena sādhayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1008: buddheṣv api tathā jñeyaṃ saṃdarśanamadarśanam // AMsa_9.17 //
SA20asmahsbu:1009: anena ṣaṣṭhena buddhavineyeṣu satsu buddhotpādāt taddarśanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1013: tathā jine vinābhogaṃ deśanāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ // AMsa_9.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:1015: buddheṣv api vinābhogaṃ tathā kṛtyanidarśanam // AMsa_9.19 //
SA20asmahsbu:1016: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyām anābhogena buddhakāryaṃ sādhayaty aghaṭitatūryaśabdamaṇiprabhāvasādharmyeṇa /
SA20asmahsbu:1019: yathākāśe kriyāṇāṃ hi hānir abhyudayaḥ sadā /
SA20asmahsbu:1022: ākāśa iva lokakriyāṇām avicchede 'pi cānyānyakriyodayavyayas tathaiva /
SA20asmahsbu:1025: na śuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā // AMsa_9.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:1031: tatra cānāsrave dhātau buddhānāṃ paramātmā nirdiśyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1034: agraṃ nairātmyaṃ viśuddhā tathatā sā ca buddhānām ātmā svabhāvārthena tasyāṃ viśuddhāyām agraṃ nairātmyam ātmānaṃ buddhā labhante śuddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1035: ataḥ śuddhātmalābhitvāt buddhā ātmamāhātmyaṃ prāptā ity anenābhisaṃdhinā buddhānām anāsrave dhātau paramātmā vyavasthāpyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1036: na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1038: tenaiva kāraṇena buddhatvaṃ na bhāva ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1041: ato buddhasya bhāvābhāvapraśne bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇān na bhavatīty evamādir avyākṛtanayo mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1042: dāhaśāntir yathā lohe darśane timirasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1043: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate // AMsa_9.25 //
SA20asmahsbu:1044: yathā ca lohe dāhaśāntir darśane ca timiram etasya śāntir na bhāvo dāhatimirayor abhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1046: evaṃ buddhānāṃ cittajñāne ca dāhatimirasthānīyayo rāgāvidyayoḥ śāntir na bhāvaḥ śasyate tadabhāvaprabhāvitatvāc cetaḥprajñāvimuktyā nābhāvas tena tena vimuktilakṣaṇena bhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1047: buddhānām amale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1056: etau ratnākarameghopamatve pūrṇacandramahādityopamatve ca ślokau gatārthau /
SA20asmahsbu:1058: sadaikakāryā vartante lokam ālokayanti ca // AMsa_9.29 //
SA20asmahsbu:1065: bhānos tathaiva buddhānāṃ jñeyā jñānaviniḥsṛtiḥ // AMsa_9.31 //
SA20asmahsbu:1066: ekakāle sarvaraśmiviniḥsṛtyā sa ca buddhānām ekakāle jñānapravṛttiṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1068: tathaiva buddhajñānānāṃ vṛttau nāsti mamāyitam // AMsa_9.32 //
SA20asmahsbu:1070: sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate // AMsa_9.33 //
SA20asmahsbu:1076: tathā buddhajñānānām āvaraṇaṃ satvānām ābhājanatvena duṣṭatā pañcakaṣāyātyutsadatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:1079: yathā pāṃśuviśeṣeṇa vastre raṅgavicitratā kvacid avicitratā /
SA20asmahsbu:1084: buddhānām etad uditaṃ raṅgair vākāśacitraṇā // AMsa_9.36 //
SA20asmahsbu:1085: etad anāsravadhātau buddhānāṃ trividhaṃ gāmbhīryam evam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1089: tat punar lakṣaṇagāmbhīryaṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ paramātmalakṣaṇam avyākṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vimuktilakṣaṇaṃ cārabhyoktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1091: seyamanāsrave dhātau niṣprapañcatvād ākāśopame gāmbhīryaprabhedadeśanā yathā raṅgair ākāśacitraṇī veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:1093: tathāgatatvaṃ tasmāc ca tadgarbhāḥ sarvadehinaḥ // AMsa_9.37 //
SA20asmahsbu:1094: sarveṣāṃ nirviśiṣṭā tathatā tadviśuddhisvabhāvaś ca tathāgataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1095: ataḥ sarve satvās tathāgatagarbhā ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1101: ābhyāṃ tāvad dvābhyāṃ prabhāvotkarṣaviśeṣeṇa buddhānāṃ vibhutvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1102: aprameyam acintyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ bauddham iṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1103: yasya yatra yathā yāvat kāle yasmin pravartate // AMsa_9.40 //
SA20asmahsbu:1104: anena tṛtīyena prakāraprabhedagāmbhīryaviśeṣābhyāṃ katham aprameyaṃ kathaṃ vācintyam ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:1105: yasya pudgalasyārthe tat pravartate yatra lokadhātau yathā tādṛśaiḥ prakārair yāvad alpaṃ (Msa 41)
SA20asmahsbu:1115: manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare nirvikalpe suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1119: arthaparāvṛttau udgraharparāvṛttau ca kṣetraviśuddhivibhutvaṃ paramaṃ labhyate yena yathākāmaṃ bhogasaṃdarśanaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1121: vikalpaparāvṛttau sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sarvakālam avyāghāte paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1123: apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ buddhānām acale male pade // AMsa_9.45 //
SA20asmahsbu:1124: pratiṣṭhāparāvṛttāv apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate buddhānām anāsrave dhātau /
SA20asmahsbu:1128: maithunasya parāvṛttau dvayor buddhasukhavihāre ca dārā 'saṃkleśadarśane ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1131: ākāśasaṃjñāvyāvṛttau dvayor eva cintitārthasamṛddhau ca yena gaganagarbho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1136: tatra cāprameyaṃ vibhutvam acintyakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ buddhānām anāsrave dhātau veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1138: śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām /
SA20asmahsbu:1139: vrajaty evaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā na ca punar aśeṣaṃ dhruvam iha // AMsa_9.49 //
SA20asmahsbu:1140: anena yādṛśasya paripākasya nimittaṃ bhavati taddarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1141: upacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca vimuktau paramatāyām anupacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca kuśalamūlopacaye /
SA20asmahsbu:1142: apakvaḥ śubhavṛddhau paramatāṃ vrajanapākaṃ vrajati pakvaḥ suviśuddhau paramatāṃ vrajati /
SA20asmahsbu:1143: evaṃ ca nityakālaṃ vrajati na ca niḥśeṣaṃ lokasyānantatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1144: tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ paramaguṇayogād bhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvam aśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam /
SA20asmahsbu:1145: labhante yaddhīrā daśadig sadā sadā sarvasamayaṃ tad āścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇān nādbhutam api // AMsa_9.50 //
SA20asmahsbu:1146: anena dvitīyena paripakvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ paripākasyāścaryaṃ nāścaryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1147: (Msa 43) lakṣaṇaṃ sadā sarvasamayam iti nityaṃ nirantaraṃ ca tad anubhūya mārgacaraṇaṃ suvidhicaraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1148: kvaciddharmāñ ca kaṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ bahumukhaśatair darśayati yaḥ kvacij janmāntardhiṃ kvacid api vicitrāṃ janacarīm /
SA20asmahsbu:1149: kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacid api ca nirvāṇam asakṛt na ca sthānāt tasmād vicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute // AMsa_9.51 //
SA20asmahsbu:1153: na ca sthānāc calatīty anāsravād dhātoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1154: na buddhānām evaṃ bhavati mama pakvo 'yam iti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca adhunāpācyata iti /
SA20asmahsbu:1155: vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacam upayāty eva janatā śubhair dharmair nityaṃ diśi diśi samantāt trayamukham // AMsa_9.52 //
SA20asmahsbu:1158: yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadair aṃśavisaraiḥ prapākakaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte /
SA20asmahsbu:1159: tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte // AMsa_9.53 //
SA20asmahsbu:1161: yathaikasmād dīpād bhavati sumahān dīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa punar eti vyayamataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1162: yathaikasmād buddhād pākābhavati sumahān paripākapākanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punar eti punar upaiti vyayamataḥ // AMsa_9.54 //
SA20asmahsbu:1165: yathā toyais tṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1166: tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair na tṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryam iha tat // AMsa_9.55 //
SA20asmahsbu:1167: anena saptamena paripakvānāṃ vimuktipraveśe samudrodāharaṇena dharmadhātor atṛptiṃ cāvakāśadānād avṛddhiṃ dhyānādhikatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1176: eṣa hetvarthaṃ phalārthaṃ cārabhya dvitīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1182: eṣa karmārthaṃ yogārthaṃ cārabhya tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1183: trividhiṃ kāyādinirmāṇaṃ karma samādhidhāraṇīmukhābhyāṃ dvayena cāprameyeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa samanvāgamo yogaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1191: kāyabhedā hi buddhānāṃ prathamas tu dvayāśrayaḥ // AMsa_9.60 //
SA20asmahsbu:1197: kṣetraiś ca nāmabhiḥ kāyair dharmasaṃbhogaceṣṭitaiḥ // AMsa_9.61 //
SA20asmahsbu:1198: tatra sāṃbhogikaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍalabuddhakṣetranām aśarīradharmasaṃbhogakriyābhir bhinnaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1199: samaḥ sūkṣmaś ca tacchiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1203: tena sāṃbhogikena kāyena saṃbaddhaḥ saṃbhogavibhutve ca hetur yatheṣṭaṃ bhogadarśanāya /
SA20asmahsbu:1206: nairmāṇikas tu kāyo buddhānām aprameyaprabhedaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ sāṃbhogikaḥ svāthasaṃpattilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1208: evaṃ dvayārthasaṃpattir yathākramaṃ dvayoḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ sāṃbhogike ca kāye nairmāṇike ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1211: sa punar nirmāṇakāyaḥ sadā vineyārthaṃ śilpasya vīṇāvādanādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1213: nirvāṇasya ca darśanair vimocane mahopāyatvāt parārthasaṃpattilakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1214: tribhiḥ kāyais tu vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1215: sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho yas tribhiḥ kāyair nirdarśitaḥ // AMsa_9.65 //
SA20asmahsbu:1216: tribhiś ca kāyair buddhānāṃ sarvakāyasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1217: ebhis tribhiḥ kāyaiḥ sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho nidarśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1218: dvayoḥ svaparārthaprabhāvitatvāt dvayoś ca tadāśritatvād yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1221: te ca trayaḥ kāyāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yathākramaṃ tribhir nirviśeṣā āśrayeṇa dharmadhātor abhinnatvāt āśayena pṛthak buddhāśayasyābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1223: teṣu ca triṣu kāyeṣu yathākramaṃ trividhā nityatā veditavyā yena nityakāyās tathāgatā ucyante /
SA20asmahsbu:1230: caturvidhaṃ buddhānāṃ jñānam ādarśajñānaṃ samatājñānaṃ pratyavekṣājñānaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1231: ādarśajñānam acalaṃ trīṇi jñānāni tadāśritāni calāni /
SA20asmahsbu:1233: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ na ca teṣv āmukhaṃ sadā // AMsa_9.68 //
SA20asmahsbu:1234: ādarśajñānam amamam aparicchinnaṃ deśataḥ sadānugaṃ kālataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1235: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ sadāvaraṇavigamāt na ca teṣv āmukham anākāratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1239: teṣāṃ ca samatādijñānānāṃ sarvaprakārāṇāṃ hetutvāt sarvajñānānāmākaropamaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1243: yadbodhisatvenābhisamayakāleṣu samatājñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ tadbhāvanāśuddhito budhiprāptasyāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇe niviṣṭaṃ samatājñānamiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1246: mahāmaitrīkaruṇābhyāṃ sarvakālānugaṃ yathādhimokṣaṃ ca satvānāṃ buddhabimbanidarśakaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1247: yataḥ kecit satvās tathāgataṃ nīlavarṇaṃ paśyanti kecit pītavarṇam ity evamādi /
SA20asmahsbu:1249: dhāraṇīnāṃ samādhīnāṃ nidhānopamam eva ca // AMsa_9.72 //
SA20asmahsbu:1255: kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu nirmāṇair nānāprakārair aprameyair acintyaiś ca sarvasatvārthakaraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1257: acintyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ tac ca sarvathā // AMsa_9.75 //
SA20asmahsbu:1258: tac ca buddhanirmāṇaṃ sadā sarvathā cācintyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1269: eka eva buddha ity etann eṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1275: puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravaiyarthyaṃ ca syād anyeṣāṃ bodhisatvānām anabhisaṃbodhān na ca yuktaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1276: tasmād avaiyarthyād api naika eva buddhaḥ satvārthakriyāsākalyaṃ ca na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1277: buddhasya buddhatve kasyacit apratiṣṭhāpanād etac ca na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1278: na ca kaścid ādibuddho 'sti vinā saṃbhāreṇa buddhatvāyogād vinā cānyena buddhena saṃsthānāyogād ity anāditvād apy eko buddho na yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1279: bahutvam api neṣyate buddhānāṃ dharmakāyasyābhedād anāsrave dhātau /
SA20asmahsbu:1282: sarvathā 'nupalambhaś ca upalambhaḥ paro mataḥ // AMsa_9.78 //
SA20asmahsbu:1283: yā parikalpitena svabhāvenāvidyamānatā saiva paramā vidyamānatā pariniṣpannena svabhāvena /
SA20asmahsbu:1284: yaś ca sarvathā 'nupalambhaḥ parikalpitasya svabhāvasya sa eva parama upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannasvabhāvasya /
SA20asmahsbu:1286: pratilambhaḥ paraś ceṣṭaḥ pratilambhaṃ ca paśyatām // AMsa_9.79 //
SA20asmahsbu:1287: saiva paramā bhāvanā yo bhāvanāyā anupalambhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1288: sa eva paramaḥ pratilambho yaḥ pratilambhānupalambhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1289: paśyatāṃ gurutvaṃ tāṃ dīrghaṃ nimittaṃ vīryam ātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1290: mānināṃ bodhisatvānāṃ dūre bodhir nirūpyate // AMsa_9.80 //
SA20asmahsbu:1291: ye ca gurutvaṃ bahutvaṃ paśyanti adbhutadharmayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1296: teṣām evaṃ mānināṃ bodhisatvānām aupalambhikatvāt dūre bodhir nirūpyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1299: kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat sarvam iti paśyatāṃ tasyāpi kalpanāmātrasyāvikalpanād akalpabodhisatvānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāvasthāyām arthataḥ prāptaiva bodhir ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1301: bhinnāśrayā bhinnajalāś ca nadyaḥ alpodakāḥ kṛtyapṛthaktvakāryāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1303: samudraviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarvā ekāśrayā ekamahājalāś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1304: miśraikakāryāś ca mahopabhogyā jalāśritaprāṇigaṇasya nityam // AMsa_9.83 //
SA20asmahsbu:1305: bhinnāśrayā bhinnamatāś ca dhīrāḥ svalpāvabodhāḥ pṛthagātmakṛtyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1307: buddhatvaviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarve ekāśrayā ekamahāvabodhāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1308: miśrekakāryāś ca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi // AMsa_9.85 //
SA20asmahsbu:1315: śubhaparamasukhākṣayākaratvāt śubhamatir arhati bodhicittam āptum // AMsa_9.86 //
SA20asmahsbu:1325: ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1327: eṣa ca bodhyadhikāra ādim ārabhya yāvat bodhipaṭalānusāreṇānugantavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1329: jātājātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1330: abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca // AMsa_10.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:1344: hāryā kīrṇā 'vyāvakīrṇā vipakṣair hīnodārā āvṛtā 'nāvṛtā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1345: yuktā 'yuktā saṃbhṛtā 'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ // AMsa_10.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:1383: avipraṇāśaḥ sthairyaṃ ca viśeṣagamanaṃ tathā // AMsa_10.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:1392: bhrāntikāyāmāmukhāyāṃ śrutamayādikāyāṃ ca yāvat madhyāyāṃ viśeṣagamanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1398: bhṛtyopamā svārthināṃ sā rājaprakhyā parārthinām // AMsa_10.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:1399: yathā śvā duḥkhārtaḥ satatam avitṛptaḥ kṣudhitako yathā kūrmaś cāsau jalavivarake saṃkucitakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1401: yathā rājā rājñāṃ viṣaye vaśavartī viharati /
SA20asmahsbu:1402: tathā kāmisthātṛsvaparajanakṛtyārtham udite viśeṣo vijñeyaḥ satatam adhimuktayā vividhayā /
SA20asmahsbu:1403: mahāyāne tasya vidhivad iha matvā paramatāṃ bhṛśaṃ tasmin dhīraḥ satatam iha tām eva vṛṇuyāt // AMsa_10.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:1404: api khalu kāminām adhimuktiḥ śvasadṛśī laukikasamādhigatānāṃ kūrmaprakhyā svārthavatāṃ bhṛtyopamā /
SA20asmahsbu:1409: aprameyā yataḥ satvā layaṃ nāto 'dhivāsayet // AMsa_10.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:1415: yathā puṇyaṃ prasavate pareṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadat /
SA20asmahsbu:1416: na tu svayaṃ sa bhuñjānas tathā puṇyamahodayaḥ // AMsa_10.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:1419: na tu svārthāśrayād dharmād deśitād upalabhyate // AMsa_10.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:1420: yathā bhojanaṃ dadataḥ puṇyam utpadyate parārthādhikārāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1422: evaṃ parārthāśrayadeśitāt mahāyānadharmāt teṣu teṣu sūtreṣūktaḥ puṇyodayo mahāṃl labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:1425: iti vipulagatau mahoghamahāryadharme janiya sadā matimān mahādhimuktim /
SA20asmahsbu:1426: vipulasatatapuṇyatadvivṛddhiṃ vrajati guṇair asamair mahātmatāṃ ca // AMsa_10.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:1428: vistīrṇe mahāyānadharme 'pariṇīyayodārādhimuktyā matimān trividhaṃ phalaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA20asmahsbu:1429: vipulapuṇyavṛddhiṃ tasyā evādhimukter vṛddhiṃ taddhetukāṃ cātulyaguṇamahātmatāṃ buddhatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1434: piṭakatrayaṃ dvayaṃ vā saṃgrahataḥ kāraṇair navabhir iṣṭam /
SA20asmahsbu:1437: tad eva trayaṃ hīnayānāgrayānabhedena dvayaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:1439: tatpunas trayaṃ dvayaṃ vā kenārthena piṭakam ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:1442: navabhiḥ kāraṇair vicikitsāpratipakṣeṇa sūtraṃ yo yatrārthe saṃśayitas tasya tanniścayārthaṃ deśanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1445: (Msa 54) punaḥ śikṣātrayadeśanā sūtreṇa adhiśīlādhicittasaṃpādanatā vinayena śīlavato 'vipratisārādavipratisāreṇa samādhilābhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1459: teṣāṃ jñānād dhīmān sarvākārajñatām eti // AMsa_11.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:1460: te ca sūtravinayābhidharmāḥ pratyekaṃ caturvidhārthāḥ samāsatas teṣāṃ jñānād bodhisatvaḥ sarvajñatāṃ prāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1461: śrāvakas tv ekasyā api gāthāyā artham ājñāyāsravakṣyaṃ prāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:1462: āśrayato lakṣaṇato dharmād arthāc ca sūcanāt sūtram /
SA20asmahsbu:1466: tatrāśrayo yatra deśe deśitaṃ yena yasmai ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1470: abhimukhatvād abhīkṣṇatvād abhibhavanād abhigamanāc cābhidharmo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1472: abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmo 'bhidharma ekaikasya dharmasya rūpyarūpisanidarśanādiprabhedena bahulanirdeśāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1475: āpatter utthānād vyutthānān niḥsṛteś ca vinayatvam /
SA20asmahsbu:1477: āpattitaḥ samutthānato vyutthānato niḥsaraṇataś ca veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1480: samutthānam āpattīnām ajñānāt pramādāt kleśaprācuryādanādarāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:1486: ajñānāt prasrabdhiḥ samagreṇa saṃghena śikṣāpadastha pratiprasrambhaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1492: prajñaptito yadā 'rocite pudgalāparādhe śāstā saṃnipātya saṃghaśikṣāṃ prajñāpayati /
SA20asmahsbu:1493: pravibhāgato yaḥ prajñapte śikṣāpade tad uddeśasya vibhāgaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1494: viniścayataś ca tatrāpattiḥ kathaṃ bhavaty anāpattir veti nirdhāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1496: ālambanaṃ mato dharmaḥ ādhyātmaṃ bāhyakaṃ dvayam /
SA20asmahsbu:1497: lābho dvayor dvayārthena dvayoś cānupalambhataḥ // AMsa_11.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:1499: tatra grāhakabhūtaṃ kāyādikamādhyātmikaṃ grāhyabhūtaṃ bāhyaṃ tayor eva tathatādvayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1500: tatra dvayor ādhyātmikabāhyayor ālambanayor dvayārthena lābho yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:1501_0: yadi grāhyārthād grāhakārtham abhinnaṃ paśyati grāhakārthāc ca grāhyārthaṃ dvayasya
SA20asmahsbu:1501_1: punaḥ samastasyādhyātmikabāhyālambanasya tathatāyā lābhas tayor eva dvayor anupalambhād veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1503: arthakhyānasya jalpāc ca nāmni sthānāc ca cetasaḥ // AMsa_11.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:1506: trividhālambanalābhaś ca pūrvoktas tat samāśritaḥ // AMsa_11.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:1507: dharmālambanalābhaḥ punas tribhir jñānair bhavati śrutacintābhāvanāmayaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1508: tatra samāhitena cetasā manojalpair yathoktārthaprasannasya tatpradhāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:1509: śrutamayena jñānena tallābhaḥ manojalpair iti saṃkalpaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:1513: yadi manojalpād evāyam arthaḥ khyātīti paśyati nānyan manojalpād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe /
SA20asmahsbu:1514: cittasya nāmni sthānāt bhāvanāmayena jñānena tallābho veditavyo dvayānupalambhād yathoktaṃ dvayālambanalābhe /

SA20asmahsbu:2300: yatra bhagavān kvacid dānādi vivarṇayati anyatra varṇitavān /
SA20asmahsbu:2304: yatra bhagavān kasyacid buddhasyādhikāṃ saṃpattiṃ varṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2307: ye buddhabodhisatveṣv akāraṃ kariṣyanti te sarve svargopagā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA20asmahsbu:2310: kṛtsnadhātupuṣṭiḥ sarvamahāyānādhiṣṭhānāya dhātupuṣṭis tadāvaraṇavigamāt sarvatra mahāyāne 'dhimuktilābhataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2312: dṛṣṭe dharme dvividho 'nuśaṃsaḥ sāṃparāyike 'ṣṭavidhaḥ krameṇottarāuttaraviśeṣalābhād veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2314: iti sugatirakhedavān kṛpāluḥ prathitayaśāḥ suvidhijñatām upetaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2315: bhavati sukathiko hi bodhisatvas tapati jane kathitair yathaiva sūryaḥ // AMsa_12.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:2319: pañca kāraṇāni sukathikatvasya yenāviparītaṃ darśayati abhīkṣṇaṃ nirāmiṣacitta ādeyavākyavineyānurūpaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2326: yathārtham ājñāya dharmamājñāya dharmānudharmapratipanno bhavati sāmīcīpratipanno 'nudharmacārī tatsaṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2331: (Msa 85) etat samādhitrayaṃ laukikaṃ na mithyātvaṃ lokottarajñānāvāhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2335: evam arthajñaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sūtrādīnāṃ kolopamatāṃ jānāti /
SA20asmahsbu:2339: etena dvividhena pārthagjanenārthadharmajñānena dvayaṃ nairātmyabhāvaṃ pratividhya yathākramaṃ tasya jñānasya pariniṣpattyarthaṃ pratipadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2342: ādibhūmau samaṃ sarvair bodhisatvais tadātmabhiḥ // AMsa_13.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:2343: tato jñānaṃ sa labhate lokottaramanuttaram iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2345: ādibhūmau pramuditāyāṃ bhūmau samaṃ sarvair bodhisatvais tadātmabhir iti tadbhūmikair evaṃ sāmīcīpratipanno bhavati tadbhūmikabodhisatvasamatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:2350: anudharmaṃ caraty evaṃ pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu // AMsa_13.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:2357: suyogo guṇavān deśo yatra dhīmān prapadyate // AMsa_13.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:2366: akhinno bodhisatvaś ca jñeyaḥ satpurūṣo mahān // AMsa_13.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:2372: saddharmālambanatayā susaṃbhṛtasaṃbhāratayā śamathādinimittānāṃ kālena kālaṃ bhāvanātayā alpamātrāsaṃtuṣṭitayā satyuttarakaraṇīye sātatyasatkṛtyaprayogatayā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2374: samādher vicayasyāpi pūrve hi kṛtapuṇyatā // AMsa_13.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:2375: anena caturthena pūrvakṛtapuṇyatāṃ pañcavidhena hetutvena darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2378: ārogyasamādhiprajñāhetutvena ca yata ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ saṃpadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2381: tasmād rāgādayas teṣāṃ buddhair niḥsaraṇaṃ matāḥ // AMsa_13.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:2383: nāham anyatra rāgād rāgasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmy evaṃ dveṣān mohād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2385: yasmād dharmadhātuvinirmukto dharmo nāsti dharmatāvyatirekeṇa dharmābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2386: tasmād rāgādidharmatāpi rāgādyākhyāṃ labhate sa ca niḥsaraṇaṃ rāgādīnām ity evaṃ tatrābhisaṃdhir veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2388: tasmāt saṃkleśanirdeśe sa saṃvid dhīmatāṃ mataḥ // AMsa_13.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:2389: yad uktaṃ / avidyā ca bodhiś caikam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2392: yatas tān eva rāgādīn yoniśaḥ pratipadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2393: tato vimucyate tebhyas tenaiṣāṃ niḥsṛtis tataḥ // AMsa_13.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:2394: tān eva rāgādīn yoniśaḥ pratipadyamānas tebhyo vimucyate tasmāt parijñātās ta eva teṣāṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhavatīty ayam atrābhisaṃdhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2396: na khalu jinasutānāṃ bādhakaṃ duḥkhamugraṃ narakabhavanavāsaiḥ satvahetoḥ kathaṃcit /
SA20asmahsbu:2397: śamabhavaguṇadoṣapreritā hīnayāne vividhaśubhavikalpā bādhakā dhīmatāṃ tu // AMsa_13.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:2398: na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:2399: svahitaparamaśītas tvanyayāne vikalpaḥ paramasukhavihāre 'pyantarāyaṃ karoti // AMsa_13.15 //
SA20asmahsbu:2406: yathaiva citre vidhivadvicitrite natonnataṃ nasti ca dṛśyate 'tha ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2407: abhūtakalpe 'pi tathaiva sarvathā dvayaṃ sadā nasti ca dṛśyate 'the ca // AMsa_13.17 //
SA20asmahsbu:2408: yathaiva toye lutiṭite prasādite na jāyate sā punar acchatānyataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2409: malāpakarṣas tu sa tatra kevalaḥ svacittaśuddhau vidhir eṣa eva hi // AMsa_13.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:2410: mataṃ ca cittaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ sadā tadāgantukadoṣadūṣitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2411: na dharmatācittamṛte 'nyacetasaḥ prabhāsvaratvaṃ prakṛtau vidhīyate // AMsa_13.19 //
SA20asmahsbu:2412: dharmābhāvaś ca dharmopalabdhiś ceti trāsasthānaṃ niḥsaṃkleśatā ca dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyā viśuddhatā ca paścād iti trāsasthānaṃ bālānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2413: tadyathākramaṃ māyādisādṛśyenākāśasādṛśyena ca prasādhayaṃs tatas trāsaṃ pratiṣedhayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2414: tathā citre natonnatasādṛśyena lutitaprasāditatoyasādṛśyena ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2416: yathā toyaṃ prakṛtyā prasannam āgantukena tu kāluṣyeṇa lutitaṃ bhavaty evaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā prabhāsvaraṃ matam āgantukais tu doṣair dūṣitam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2417: na ca dharmatācittād ṛte 'nyasya cetasaḥ paratantralakṣaṇasya prakṛtiprabhāsvaratvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2421: yathaikaputrake tasmāt sadā hitakaraṃ matam // AMsa_13.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:2422: satveṣu hitakāritvān naity āpattiṃ sa rāgajāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2423: dveṣo virudyate tvasya sarvasatveṣu satpathā // AMsa_13.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:2424: yathā kapotī svasutātivatsalā svabhāvakāṃs tān upaguhya tiṣṭhati /
SA20asmahsbu:2425: tathāvidhāyaṃ pratigho virudhyate suteṣu tadvat sakṛpe 'pi dehiṣu // AMsa_13.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:2426: maitrī yataḥ pratighacittam ato viruddhaṃ śāntir yato vyasanacittam ato viruddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2428: artho yato nikṛticittam ato viruddhaṃ lhādo yataḥ pratibhayaṃ na ca tato viruddhaṃ // AMsa_13.23 //
SA20asmahsbu:2429: yat satveṣu bodhisatvasya prema so 'ca rāgo 'bhipretas tatkṛtām āpattiṃ teṣāṃ pratiṣedhayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2431: kapotīm udāharati tadbahurāgatvāt apatyasnehādhimātratayā sakṛpe bodhisatve dehiṣu satveṣu pratigho virudhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2432: bodhisatvānāṃ satveṣu maitrī bhavati vyasanaśāntiḥ arthadānaṃ hlādaś ca prītyutpādāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2433: yata ime maitryādayas tata eva pratighacittaṃ viruddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2437: āture ca yathā vaidyaḥ satveṣu pratipadyate // AMsa_13.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:2439: vaṇigyathā punaḥ puṇye kāmeṣu pratipadyate // AMsa_13.25 //
SA20asmahsbu:2441: pitā yathā sute bāle satvāheṭhe prapadyate // AMsa_13.26 //
SA20asmahsbu:2445: pratipattiryathā yasmin bodhisatvasya sā matā // AMsa_13.28 //
SA20asmahsbu:2459: paramavimalanirvikalpabuddhyā vrajati sa siddhim anuttamāṃ krameṇa // AMsa_13.29 //
SA20asmahsbu:2461: iti nirvikalpena dharmanairātmyajñānena pratipattuḥ pratipattavyasya pratipatteś cāvikalpanā trimaṇḍalapariśuddhir veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:2462: dvayaparipācanaśodhaneṣu yukta iti satvānām ātmanaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2468: saṃpūrṇaḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ sāgaro vāribhiryathā // AMsa_14.1 //
SA20asmahsbu:2472: suvijñaḥ kalpacittaś ca bhāvanāyāṃ prayujyate // AMsa_14.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:2480: sūtrādināmni bandhīyāc cittaṃ prathamato yatiḥ // AMsa_14.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:2482: vicārayet tadarthāṃś ca pratyātmayoniśaś ca saḥ // AMsa_14.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:2483: avadhṛtya ca tān arthān dharme saṃkalayet punaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2484: tataḥ kuryāt samāśastiṃ tadarthādhigamāya saḥ // AMsa_14.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:2486: sūtrageyādike dharme yatsūtrādināma daśabhūmikam ity evamādi tatra cittaṃ prathamato badhnīyāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2487: ebhis tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ ṣaṭ cittāny upadiṣṭāni /
SA20asmahsbu:2488: mūlacittam anucaracittaṃ vicāraṇācittam avadhāraṇācittaṃ saṃkalanacittam āśāsticittaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2491: tadyathā 'nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmyaṃ ca yoniśo na cety ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:2492: anucaracittaṃ yena sūtrādīnāṃ nāmata ālambitānāṃ padaprabhedam anugacchati /
SA20asmahsbu:2494: tatrārthaṃ caturbhir ākārair vicārayati gaṇanayā tulanayā mīmāṃsayā pratyavekṣaṇayā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2495: tatra gaṇanā saṃgrahaṇaṃ tadyathā rūpaṃ daśāyatanāny ekasya ca pradeśo vedanā ṣaḍ vedanākāyā ity evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:2496: tulanā saṃkhyāvato dharmasya śamalakṣagrahaṇam anādhyāropān apavādataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2501: sārthatathā ca samastānāṃ vyañjanānāṃ nirarthatayā ca vyastānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2502: avadhāraṇācittaṃ yena yathānucaritaṃ vicāritaṃ vā tannimittam avadhārayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2503: saṃkalanacittaṃ tadyathā vicāritam arthaṃ mūlacitte saṃkṣipya paripiṇḍitākāraṃ vartate /
SA20asmahsbu:2504: āśāsticittaṃ yadarthaṃ prayukto bhavati samā tatparipūryarthaṃ vā śrāmaṇyaphalārthaṃ vā bhūmipraveśārthaṃ vā viśeṣagamanārthaṃ vā tacchandasahagataṃ vartate /
SA20asmahsbu:2505: cittam eva hy ālambanapratibhāsaṃ vartate na cittād anyad ālambanam astīti jānato vā cittamātram ajānato vā cittam evālambanaṃ nānyat /
SA20asmahsbu:2511: yuganaddhaś ca vijñeyo mārgas tatpiṇḍitaṃ punaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2512: līnaṃ cittasya gṛhṇīyād uddhataṃ śamayet punaḥ // AMsa_14.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:2514: sātatyenātha satkṛtya sarvasmin yojayet punaḥ // AMsa_14.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:2515: ebhiś caturbhiḥ ślokair ekādaśa manaskārā upadiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2527: avagamyāśu vikṣepaṃ tasmin pratiharet punaḥ // AMsa_14.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:2528: pratyātmaṃ saṃkṣipec cittam upary upari buddhimān /
SA20asmahsbu:2529: tataś ca ramayec cittaṃ samādhau guṇadarśanāt // AMsa_14.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:2531: abhidhyā daurmanasyādīn vyutthitān śamayet tathā // AMsa_14.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:2534: ebhiś caturbhiḥ ślokair navākārayā cittasthityā sthityupāya upadiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2535: cittaṃ sthāpayati saṃsthāpayati avasthāpayati upasthāpayati damayati śamayati vyupaśamayaty ekotīkaroti cittaṃ samādadhātīti navākārāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2536: tataḥ sa tanukāṃ labdhvā praśrabdhiṃ kāyacetasoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2537: vijñeyaḥ samanaskāraḥ punas tāns tāṃ sa vivardhayan // AMsa_14.15 //
SA20asmahsbu:2539: tāṃ śodhayann abhijñārtham eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ // AMsa_14.16 //
SA20asmahsbu:2541: pūjārtham aprameyāṇāṃ buddhāyāṃ śravaṇāya ca // AMsa_14.17 //
SA20asmahsbu:2543: karmaṇyatāṃ parām eti cetasas tadupāsanāt // AMsa_14.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:2544: eti karmaṇyatāṃ parāṃ dhyāne iti saṃbandhanīyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2547: tato 'nuśaṃsān labhate pañca śuddhaiḥ sa pūrvagān /
SA20asmahsbu:2548: viśuddhibhājanatvaṃ ca tato yāti niruttaraṃ // AMsa_14.19 //
SA20asmahsbu:2549: kṛtsnādau svalpadauṣṭhulya kāyo hi dravate 'sya pratikṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2550: āpūryate ca praśrabdhyā kāyacittaṃ samantataḥ // AMsa_14.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:2553: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasya sarvathā /
SA20asmahsbu:2554: karoti satataṃ dhīmān evaṃ hetuparigrahaṃ // AMsa_14.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:2560: prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasyeti daśamyāṃ bhūmau paripūri rbuddhabhūmau viśuddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2561: eteṣāṃ pañcānām anuśaṃsānāṃ trayaḥ śamathapakṣā dvau vipaśyanāpakṣau veditavyau /
SA20asmahsbu:2564: manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvārthān na prapaśyati // AMsa_14.23 //
SA20asmahsbu:2568: prahīno grāhyanivikṣepas tadā tasya bhavaty asau // AMsa_14.25 //
SA20asmahsbu:2570: ānantaryasamādhiṃ ca spṛśaty āśu tadā punaḥ // AMsa_14.26 //
SA20asmahsbu:2572: tathābhūto bodhisatvaḥ samāhitacitto manojalpād vinirmuktān sarvadharmān na paśyati svalakṣaṇasāmānyalakṣaṇākhyān manojalpamātram eva khyāti /
SA20asmahsbu:2574: ayaṃ sa āloko yam adhikṛtyoktaṃ kṣāranadyām /
SA20asmahsbu:2575: āloka iti dharmanidhyānakṣānter etad adhivacanam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2576: sa tasyaiva dharmālokasya vivṛddhyartham āsthitakriyayā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:2588: jñeyāny uṣmagatādīni etāni hi yathākramaṃ // AMsa_14.27 //
SA20asmahsbu:2591: nirvikalpaṃ malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ // AMsa_14.28 //
SA20asmahsbu:2598: etena virajo vigatamalam ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:2600: ameyaiś cāsya sā kalpaiḥ suviśuddhiṃ nigacchati // AMsa_14.29 //
SA20asmahsbu:2602: dharmadhātoś ca samatāṃ pratividhya punas tadā /
SA20asmahsbu:2606: dharmanairātmyena ca dharmasamatāṃ pratividhya sarvasatveṣu sadā ātmasamacittatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:2612: tadanyabodhisatvasamatayā ca yathā tair abhisamitaṃ tathābhisamayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2618: labdhvā darśanamārgo hi tadā tena nirūcyate // AMsa_14.33 //
SA20asmahsbu:2619: tasya grāhyagrāhakābhāvasya bhāvaṃ dharmadhātūn darśanaprahātavyaiḥ kleśair vimuktaṃ paśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:2621: prakṛtyā śūnyatāṃ jñātvā śūnyajña iti kathyate // AMsa_14.34 //
SA20asmahsbu:2623: sa ca bodhisatvaḥ śūnyajña ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2626: tathā bhāvasya śūnyatā paratantrasya sa hi na tathābhāvo yathā kalpyate svena lakṣaṇena bhāvaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2631: abhūtaparikalpas tadapraṇidhānasya padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2632: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2634: tena darśanamārgeṇa saha bodhisatvasya sarveṣāṃ bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābho veditavyaḥ smṛtyupasthānādīnāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2635: saṃskāramātraṃ jagad etya buddhyā nirātmakaṃ duḥkhivirūḍhimātraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2636: vihāya yānarthamayātmadṛṣṭiḥ mahātmadṛṣṭiṃ śrayate mahārthāṃ // AMsa_14.37 //
SA20asmahsbu:2637: vinātmadṛṣṭyā ya ihātmadṛṣṭir vināpi duḥkhena suduḥkhitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2638: sarvārthakartā na ca kārakāṅkṣī yathātmanaḥ svātmahitāni kṛtvā // AMsa_14.38 //
SA20asmahsbu:2639: yo muktacittaḥ parayā vimuktyā baddhaś ca gāḍhāyatabandhanena /
SA20asmahsbu:2640: duḥkhasya paryantam apaśyamānaḥ prayujyate caiva karoti caiva // AMsa_14.39 //
SA20asmahsbu:2641: svaṃ duḥkham udvoḍhum ihāsamartho lokaḥ kutaḥ piṇḍitam anyaduḥkhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2642: janmaikam ālokayate gataṃ tvacinto viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ // AMsa_14.40 //
SA20asmahsbu:2643: yatprema yā vatsalatā prayogaḥ satveṣv akhedaś ca jinātmajānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2644: āścaryam etat paramaṃ bhaveṣu na caiva satvātmasamān abhāvāt // AMsa_14.41 //
SA20asmahsbu:2645: ebhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ślokair darśanamārgalābhino bodhisatvasya māhātmyodbhāvanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2647: mahātmadṛṣṭir iti mahārthā yā sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittalābhātmadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2649: vinātmadṛṣṭyā anarthamayyātmadṛṣṭir mahārthā yā vināpi duḥkhena svasaṃtānajena suduḥkhitā sarvasatvasaṃtānajena /
SA20asmahsbu:2650: yo vimuktacitto darśanaprahātavyebhyaḥ parayā vimuktyānuttareṇa yānena /
SA20asmahsbu:2652: duḥkhasya paryantaṃ na paśyati svadhātor anantatvād ākāśavat prayujyate ca duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai satvānāṃ karoti caiva tām aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2653: viparyayāt tasya tu bodhisatvaḥ sa hi saṃpiṇḍitasarvasatvaduḥkhaṃ yāval lokagatam udvoḍhuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2654: yā satveṣu bodhisatvasya priyatā yā ca hitasukhaiṣitā yaś ca tadarthaṃ prayogo yaś cittaprayuktasyākheda etat sarvam āścaryaṃ paramaṃ lokeṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:2665: yatra sthaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate // AMsa_14.46 //
SA20asmahsbu:2669: yathāvyavasthānaṃ ca lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhaṃ laukikaṃ yena satvān paripācayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2670: asaṃkhyeyadvayasya samāptau paścimāṃ bhāvanām āgamyāvasānagatām abhiṣikto vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ labhate /
SA20asmahsbu:2673: sarvākārajñatāṃ cānuttarapadaṃ yatrastho yāvat saṃsāram abhisaṃbodhinirvāṇasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ satvānāṃ hitāya pratipadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:2674: kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhaven mahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2675: bhṛśaṃ samāpyāyitacetasaḥ sadā prasādavegair asamaśravodbhavaiḥ // AMsa_14.47 //
SA20asmahsbu:2676: apracodyamānaḥ satataṃ ca saṃmukhaṃ tathāgatair dharmasumukhe vyavasthitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2677: nigṛhya keśeṣv iva doṣagahvarāt nikṛṣya bodhau sa balān niveśyate // AMsa_14.48 //
SA20asmahsbu:2678: sa sarvalokaṃ suviśuddhadarśanair akalpabodhair abhibhūya sarvathā /
SA20asmahsbu:2679: mahāndhakāraṃ vidhamayya bhāsate jaganmahāditya ivātyudārataḥ // AMsa_14.49 //
SA20asmahsbu:2682: yo hi dharmamukhaśrotasy avavādaṃ labhate tasya nityaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:2684: yato 'syātyarthaṃ prasādaḥ prasādavegair āpyāyitacetasas tannityadarśanaṃ buddhānāṃ mahārthaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:2686: buddhāḥ samyakpraśaṃsāṃ vidadhati satataṃ svārthasamyakprayukte nindām īrṣyāprayukte sthitivicayapare cāntarāyānukūlān /
SA20asmahsbu:2687: dharmān sarvaprakārān vidhivad iha jinā darśayanty agrasatve yān varjyāsevya yoge bhavati vipulatā saugate śāsane 'smim // AMsa_14.50 //
SA20asmahsbu:2690: adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ cādhikṛtya sthitivicayapare tadantarāyāṇāṃ tadanukūlānāṃ ca sarvaprakārāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ deśanataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2691: yān varjyāsevyety antarāyān anukūlāṃś ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2693: iti satataśubhācayaprapūrṇaḥ suvipulam etya sa cetasaḥ samādhiṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2703: tathaiva dānādiśubhasya sarvato budheṣu karma trividhaṃ nirucyate // AMsa_15.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:2710: na kāyavākcittamayasya karmaṇo jinātmajānāṃ bhavatīha saṃnatiḥ // AMsa_15.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:2711: yathā viṣāc chastramahāśanād ripor nivārayed ātmahitaḥ svam āśrayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2712: nihīnayānād vividhāj jinātmajo nivārayet karma tathā trayātmakaṃ // AMsa_15.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:2716: viṣādisādharmyaṃ hīnayānapratisaṃyuktasya karmaṇo hīnayānacittapariṇāmanāt mahāyāne kuśalamūlasamucchedanāt anutpannakuśalamūlānutpādāya /
SA20asmahsbu:2719: na karmiṇaḥ karma na karmaṇaḥ kriyāṃ sadāvikalpaḥ samudīkṣate tridhā /
SA20asmahsbu:2720: tato 'sya tatkarma viśuddhipāragaṃ bhavaty anantaṃ tadupāyasaṃgrahāt // AMsa_15.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:2721: anena ślokena caturthena viśuddhyupāyaṃ karmaṇo darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2728: sāṃkhyātha tallakṣaṇam ānupūrvī niruktir abhyāsaguṇaś ca tāsāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2729: prabhedanaṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ vipakṣo jñeyo guṇo 'nyonyaviniścayaś ca // AMsa_16.1 //
SA20asmahsbu:2732: kleśāvaśagatvam api ca kṛtyeṣu sadāviparyāsaḥ // AMsa_16.2 //
SA20asmahsbu:2739: tathā hi tadāsevanād āyatyād bahujanasupriyo bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:2743: ity abhyudayaḥ tatra cāsaṃkleśamaviparītakṛtyārambhaṃ cādhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā vyavasthitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2747: satvārtheṣu samyakprayukto bodhisatvas tisṛbhir dānaśīlakṣāntipāramitābhir yathākramaṃ tyāgenānupaghātenāupaghātamarṣaṇena ca satvārthaṃ kurute /
SA20asmahsbu:2748: tisṛbhiḥ sanidānatayā cittasthityā vimuktyā ca sarvaprakāram ātmārthaṃ carati /
SA20asmahsbu:2749: vīryaṃ niśritya yathākramaṃ dhyānaprajñābhyāsamāhitasya cittasya samavadhānāt samāhitasya mocanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2750: iti parārtham ātmārthaṃ cārabhya ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2752: āvarjanaiḥ sulapitaiḥ parārtha ātmārtha etasmāt // AMsa_16.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:2761: bhogeṣu cānabhiratis tīvrā gurutādvaye akhedaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2762: yogaś ca nirvikalpaḥ samas tam idam uttamaṃ yānaṃ // AMsa_16.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:2766: kṣāntyā vīryeṇa cākhedo dvaye yathākramaṃ duḥkhe ca satvāsatvakṛte kuśalaprayoge ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2773: tatra dānaṃ viṣayeṣv asaktimārgas tyāgābhyāsena tatsaktivigamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2774: śīlaṃ tadāptivikṣepasaṃyameṣu bhikṣusaṃvarasthasya viṣayāprāptaye sarvakarmāntavikṣepāṇām apravṛtteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2777: dhyānaṃ prajñā cāvaraṇaviśodhaneṣu mārgas tābhyāṃ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaviśodhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2780: śikṣātrayam adhikṛtya ca ṣaḍ pāramitā jinaiḥ samākhyātāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2781: ādyā tisro dvedhā antyadvayatas tisṛṣv ekā // AMsa_16.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:2783: tatrādyā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā tisraḥ pāramitāḥ sasaṃbhārasaparivāragrahaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2784: dānena hi bhoganirapekṣaḥ śīlaṃ samādatte samāttaṃ ca kṣāntyā rakṣaty ākruṣṭāpratyākrośanādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2785: dvidhety adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣā sā antena dvayena saṃgṛhītā yathākramaṃ dhyānena prajñayā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2786: tisṛṣv api śikṣāsv ekā vīryapāramitā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:2789: dānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2793: nirvikalpajñānasahagataṃ dharmanairātmyaprativedhayogāt sarvecchāparipūrakaṃ yo yad icchati tasmai tasya dānāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2794: satvaparipācakaṃ tredhā dānena satvān saṃgṛhya triṣu yāneṣu yathābhavyaniyojanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2795: śīlaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2800: vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2802: dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2804: prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:2806: yathā dānalakṣaṇaṃ caturvidham evaṃ śīlādīnāṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2807: eṣāṃ tu vipakṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ krodhaḥ kauśīdyaṃ vikṣepo dauṣprajñyaṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2809: satvaparipācakatvaṃ śīlādibhir āvarjya triṣu yāneṣu paripācanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2813: tribhiḥ kāraṇais teṣāṃ dānādīnāṃ krameṇa nirdeśaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2815: bhoganirapekṣo hi śīlaṃ samātte śīlavān kṣamo bhavati kṣamāvān vīryam ārabhate ārabdhavīryaḥ samādhim utpādayati samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20asmahsbu:2817: hīnaṃ hi dānam utkṛṣṭaṃ śīlam evaṃ yāvad dhīnaṃ dhyānam utkṛṣṭā prajñeti /
SA20asmahsbu:2819: audārikaṃ hi dānaṃ supraveśatvāt sukaratvāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2820: sūkṣmaṃ śīlaṃ tato duṣpraveśatvād duṣkaratvāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2821: evaṃ yāvad audārikaṃ dhyānaṃ sūkṣmā prajñeti /
SA20asmahsbu:2823: dāridyasyāpanayāc chaityasya ca lambhanāt kṣayāt kruddheḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2826: śaityaṃ lambhayatīti śīlaṃ tadvato viṣayanimittakleśaparidāhābhāvāt kṣayaḥ kruddher iti kṣāntis tayā krodhakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2833: upāyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca sarvāsām eva kathyate // AMsa_16.16 //
SA20asmahsbu:2836: tatropadhisaṃniśritā caturākārā hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2846: atṛptāśayena vipulāśayena muditā--āśayena upakārāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2847: tatra bodhisatvasya dāne 'tṛptāśayo yad bodhisatva ekasatvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṃgānadīvālukāsamān lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān kṛtvā pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:2849: evaṃ ca pratikṣaṇaṃ gaṃgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:2850: yathā caikasya satvasyaivaṃ yāvān satvadhātur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayitavyas tam anena paryāyeṇa pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:2853: na ca bodhisatva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātram api hāpayati /
SA20asmahsbu:2855: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne vipulāśaya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2856: muditataraś ca bodhisatvo bhavati tān satvān dānena tathānugṛhṇan /
SA20asmahsbu:2857: na tv eva te satvās tena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2858: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2859: upakārakatarāṃś ca sa bodhisatvas tān satvān ātmanaḥ samanupaśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:2863: na ca bodhisatvaḥ satveṣu tathā vipulam api dānamayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā artho bhavati vipākena vā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2864: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2867: sarvasatvasādhāraṇaṃ ca kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2868: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2869: tatra bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām atṛptāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2870_2: īryāpathaṃ kalpayann ekaṃ śīlapāramitākṣaṇaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitākṣaṇaṃ bhāvayed
SA20asmahsbu:2870_3: etena paryāyeṇa yāvāṃś chīlaskandho yāvān ca prajñāsakandho yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
SA20asmahsbu:2870_4: abhisaṃbudhyate śīlaskandhaṃ yāvat prajñāskandhaṃ bhāvayed atṛpta eva bodhisatvasya
SA20asmahsbu:2870_5: śīlapāramitābhāvanāyām āśayo yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām āśaya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2871: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyām atṛptāśayo yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām āśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2872: yadbodhisatvāstāṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāparaṃparāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paraṃparāmā bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanān na sraṃsayati na vicchinatti iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2873: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ vipulāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2874: muditataraś ca bodhisatvo bhavati tayā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanayā satvānanugṛhlan /
SA20asmahsbu:2875: na tv eva te satvā anugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2876: ya evaṃrūpa āśyo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ muditāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2878: yeṣāṃ tathā śīlapāramitābhāvanayā yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanayā upakaroti nātmānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2880: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyām upakārāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2881: na ca bodhisatvastathā vipulam api śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayaṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vārtho bhavati vipākena vā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2882: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2883: tatra yad bodhisatva evaṃ śīlapāramitābhāvanāmayasya yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāmayapuṇyaskandhasya vipākaṃ satveṣv evābhinandati nātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2885: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya śīlapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ yāvat prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyāṃ kalyāṇāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2888: tathā hi sa upāyaḥ sarvamanasikārāṇām abhiniṣpattaye /
SA20asmahsbu:2894: tathāgate dvau kāyau draṣṭavyau svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogikaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2906: dānam eva parijñāya paṇḍitaḥ samudānayet // AMsa_16.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:2917: śīlam evaṃ parijñāya paṇḍitaḥ samudānayet // AMsa_16.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:2919: ṣaḍaṅgīti śīlavān viharati yāvat samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣv iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2931: saṃketadharmatālabdhaṃ saṃvarastheṣu vidyata iti vṛttis tatra saṃketalabdhaṃ prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2932: dharmatāpratilabdhaṃ dhyānānāsravasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītam eṣāsya prabhedavṛttiḥ trividhena prabhedena vartanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:2936: pañcānuśaṃsam ākhyātaṃ dvayor arthakaraṃ ca tat // AMsa_16.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:2938: kṣāntim evaṃ parijñāya paṇḍitaḥ samudānayet // AMsa_16.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:2952: kāyasya na bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2953: dvayor arthakaraṃ ca tad iti marṣādhivāsanam ity adhikṛtaṃ idaṃ karma / yathoktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2954: dvayor arthaṃ sa kurūte ātmanaś ca parasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:2955: yaḥ paraṃ kupitaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ tatropaśāmyati // iti //
SA20asmahsbu:2959: teṣu tad ity ādhāravṛttiḥ kṣamiṣu tadvṛtteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2960: trividhaṃ matam iti prabhedavṛttis trividhakṣāntiprabhedena yathoktaṃ prāk /
SA20asmahsbu:2965: vīryam eva parijñāya paṇḍitaḥ samudānayeta // AMsa_16.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:2967: kuśala iti tadanyakṛtyotsāhavyudāsātha samyag ity anyatīrthikamokṣārthotsāhavyudāsārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2968: śraddhāc chandapratiṣṭhita iti hetuḥ śraddadhāno hy atīva vīryam ārabhati /
SA20asmahsbu:2973: yathoktaṃ ārabdhavīryas tu sukhaṃ viharaty avyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmair iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2977: sa punar adhiśīlādiśikṣātraye kāyikaṃ cetasikaṃ ca sātatyena satkṛtya ca yad vīryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2981: dharmāṇāṃ pramukhaṃ teṣu vidyate trividhaś ca saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2982: dhyānam evaṃ parijñāya paṇḍitaḥ samudānayet // AMsa_16.26 //
SA20asmahsbu:2993: teṣu vidyata iti dhyāyiṣv iyam ādhāravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2994: trividhaś ca sa iti savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ avitarko vicāramātraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3003: dharmāṇām uttaras teṣu vidyate trividhaś ca saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3004: prajñām evaṃ parijñāya paṇḍitaḥ samudānayet // AMsa_16.28 //
SA20asmahsbu:3006: samyag iti na mithyā jñeya iti laukikakṛtyasamyakpravicayavyudāsārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3012: prajñājīvasudeśana iti prajñājīvaḥ sudeśanā cāsya karma /
SA20asmahsbu:3018: teṣu vidyate trividhaś ca sa iti vṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3025: dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ pāramitābhyāṃ parigṛhītāḥ // AMsa_16.29 //
SA20asmahsbu:3027: tatra vikṣiptā dvābhyāṃ pāramitābhyāṃ saṃgṛhītāḥ prathamābhyāṃ dānasamādānaśīlayor asamāhitatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3032: na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktam eva na ca dānaṃ /
