SA20asmahsbu:3053: yathā dānāsaktir uktā evaṃ śīle yāvat prajñāyāṃ veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3054: atra tu viśeṣabhogasaktiparivartena dauḥśīlyādyāsaktir veditavyā vipakṣasaktis tadvipakṣānuśayāsamudghātanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3057: tyaktaṃ buddhasutaiḥ svajīvitam api prāpyārthinaṃ sarvadā kāruṇyāt parato na ca pratikṛtir neṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prārthitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3058: dānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'jñayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.36 //
SA20asmahsbu:3060: āttaṃ buddhasutair yamodyamamayaṃ śīlatrayaṃ sarvadā svargo nābhimataḥ sametya ca punaḥ saktirna tatrāhitā /
SA20asmahsbu:3061: śīlenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā śīlaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.37 //
SA20asmahsbu:3068: kṣāntaṃ buddhasutaiḥ suduṣkaramatho sarvāpakāraṃ nṛṇāṃ na svargārtham asaśaktimato na ca bhayān naivopakārekṣaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3069: kṣāntyānuttarayā ca sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā kṣāntir jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayā sthāpitā // AMsa_16.38 //
SA20asmahsbu:3070: iti / kṣāntyānuttarayā caiti duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntyā ca parāpakāramarṣaṇakṣāntyā ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3071: vīryaṃ buddhasutaiḥ kṛtaṃ nirūpamaṃ saṃnāhayogātmakaṃ hantuṃ kleśagaṇaṃ svato 'pi parataḥ prāptuṃ ca bodhiṃ parāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3072: vīryeṇaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā vīryaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.39 //
SA20asmahsbu:3075: dhyānaṃ buddhasutaiḥ samādhibahulaṃ saṃpāditaṃ sarvathā śreṣṭhair dhyānasukhair vihṛtya kṛpayā hīnāpapattiḥ śritā /
SA20asmahsbu:3076: dhyānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dhyānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.40 //
SA20asmahsbu:3078: jñātaṃ buddhasutaiḥ satatvam akhilaṃ jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathā saktir naiva ca nirvṛtau prajanitā buddhaiḥ kutaḥ saṃvṛtau /
SA20asmahsbu:3079: jñānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā jñānaṃ satvaparigraheṇa punar loke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam // AMsa_16.41 //
SA20asmahsbu:3081: jñeyaṃ ca yat sarvathety anantasvasaṃketādilakṣaṇabhedabhinnaṃ yad ajñeyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3083: jñānasya punaḥ satvaparigraheṇa karuṇayā satvānām aparityāgāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3084: eṣāṃ punaḥ ṣaṇāṃ ślokānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saptamena ślokena nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3086: dānādīnāṃ samas taṃ hi jñeyaṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam // AMsa_16.42 //
SA20asmahsbu:3087: iti / tatra dānādīnāṃ prathamena pādenodāratā paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsbu:3090: caturthenākṣayatā ity eṣāṃ guṇacatuṣṭayam ebhiḥ ślokair veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3092: abhibhavati sa tāṃ dātā kṛpālurādhikyayogena // AMsa_16.43 //
SA20asmahsbu:3093: yācanake hi jane dāyakadarśanāt tataś ca yathā-īpsitaṃ labdhvā manorathaparipūraṇādyā tuṣṭir utpadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3095: āśāstiś ca yā taddarśane manorathaparipūraṇe ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3099: ato dātā kṛpālus tāṃ sarvam abhibhavaty ādhikyayogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3101: āmodate nikāmaṃ tadviratiṃ pālayātra katham // AMsa_16.44 //
SA20asmahsbu:3105: mithyāvādaṃ brūyāt paropaghātāya katham āryaḥ // AMsa_16.45 //
SA20asmahsbu:3118: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu samaṃ hitakāmaḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ mitrabhedārthaṃ paiśunyaṃ kariṣyatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:3120: paraduḥkhotpādane cātyarthaṃ bhīruḥ sa kathaṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhotpādanārthaṃ paruṣaṃ vakṣyati /
SA20asmahsbu:3121: satvānāṃ vinaye samyakprayuktaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ kariṣyati tasmād asau suvidūre trividhavāgdoṣāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3123: adhivāsayet katham asau sarvākāraṃ manaḥ kleśam // AMsa_16.47 //
SA20asmahsbu:3126: upakarasaṃjñāmodaṃ hy apakāriṇiparahita saṃjñāṃparahite sadā duḥkhe /
SA20asmahsbu:3127: labhate yadā kṛpāluḥ kṣamitavyaṃ tasya kiṃ na syāt // AMsa_16.48 //
SA20asmahsbu:3131: duṣkaracaraṇāt sakṛpe hy aduṣkaraṃ vīryaṃ // AMsa_16.49 //
SA20asmahsbu:3133: tatra sakṛpe yat parārthaṃ duṣkaracaraṇād vīrthaṃ tadaduṣkaraṃ ca suduṣkaraṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3138: yad evaṃ parasaṃjñāpagataṃ ca svatodhikatarasnehaṃ ca tadvīryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3139: alpasukhaṃ hy ātmasukhaṃ līnaṃ parihāṇikaṃ kṣayi samohaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3140: dhyānaṃ mataṃ trayāṇāṃ viparyayād bodhisatvānām // AMsa_16.50 //
SA20asmahsbu:3142: līnaṃ laukikānāṃ satkāye śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca nirvāṇe /
SA20asmahsbu:3143: parihāṇikaṃ laukikānāṃ kṣayi śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe tatkṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3145: bodhisatvānāṃ punar dhyānaṃ bahusukham ātmaparasukham alīnamaparihāṇikam akṣayyasamohaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3146: āmoṣais tamasi yathā dīpair nunnaṃ tathā trayajñānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3148: yathā hastāmoṣais tamasi jñānaṃ parīttaviṣayamapratyakṣam avyaktaṃ ca tathā pṛthagjanānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3149: yathāvacarake dīpairjñānaṃ prādeśikaṃ pratyakṣaṃ nātinirmalaṃ tathā śrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3150: yathā dinakarakiraṇair jñānaṃ samantāt pratyakṣaṃ sunirmalaṃ ca tathā bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3153: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.52 //
SA20asmahsbu:3162: jñānaṃ nirvikalpaṃ yena trimaṇḍalapariśuddhaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dātṛdeyapratigrāhakāvikalpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3164: arthī duḥkhito niḥpratisaraṇo duścaritacārī guṇavāṃś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3171: samādhir ādir yathā tatraiva vibhutvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3174: yaś ca dadāti yac ca yena ca yasmai ca yataś ca yasya ca parigraheṇa yatra ca yāvat prakāraṃ tad dānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3176: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.53 //
SA20asmahsbu:3178: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.54 //
SA20asmahsbu:3180: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca paraṃ matam // AMsa_16.55 //
SA20asmahsbu:3182: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca parā matā // AMsa_16.56 //
SA20asmahsbu:3191: priyaṃ syād bodhisatvānāṃ prāg eva tadviparyayāt // AMsa_16.57 //
SA20asmahsbu:3192: yadi bodhisatvānāṃ dānam ekasyaiva satvasya sukhadaṃ syād ātmanaś ca bahukalpavighātakṛt /
SA20asmahsbu:3193: tathāpi tat teṣāṃ priyaṃ syāt karuṇāviśeṣāt kiṃ punar yad anekasatvasukhaṃ ca bhavatyā tmanaś ca bahukalpānugrahakṛt /
SA20asmahsbu:3194: yad artham icchanti dhanāni dehinas tadeva dhīrā visṛjanti dehiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3195: śarīrahetor dhanam iṣyate janais tad eva dhīraiḥ śataśo visṛjyate // AMsa_16.58 //
SA20asmahsbu:3198: śarīram evotsṛjato na duḥkhyate yadā manaḥ kā draviṇe 'vare kathā /
SA20asmahsbu:3199: tadasya lokottaram iti yan mudaṃ sa tena tat tasya tad uttaraṃ punaḥ // AMsa_16.59 //
SA20asmahsbu:3200: atra śarīram evāutsṛjato yadā mano na duḥkhyate tadasya lokottaram iti saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3201: eti yan mudaṃ sa tena duḥkhena tat tasya taduttaram iti tasmāl lokottarād uttaraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3203: sarvastidānena yatheha dhīmān tuṣṭiṃ vrajaty arthijanasya tuṣṭyā // AMsa_16.60 //
SA20asmahsbu:3206: saṃpūrṇabhogo na tathāstimantam ātmānam anvīkṣati yācako 'pi /
SA20asmahsbu:3207: sarvastidānād adhano 'pi dhīmān ātmānam anveti yathāstimantaṃ // AMsa_16.61 //
SA20asmahsbu:3208: suvipulam api vittaṃ prāpya naivopakāraṃ vigaṇayati tathārthī dāyakāl lābhahetoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3209: vidhivad iha sudānair arthinas tarpayitvā mahadupakarasaṃjñāṃ teṣu dhīmān yathaiti // AMsa_16.62 //
SA20asmahsbu:3212: svayam apagataśokā dehinaḥ svastharūpā vipulam api gṛhītvā bhuñjate yasya vittaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3213: pathi paramaphalāḍhyād bhogavṛkṣād yathaiva pravisṛtir atibhogī bodhisatvān na so 'nyaḥ // AMsa_16.63 //
SA20asmahsbu:3214: pravisṛtir atibhogaś cāsyeti pravisṛtir atibhogī sa ca nānyo bodhisatvād veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3217: caturvibandhapratipakṣabhedāt vīryaṃ parijñeyam iti pradiṣṭam // AMsa_16.64 //
SA20asmahsbu:3226: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye tanniśritas tasya yato 'nulābhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3227: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatāṃ ca siddhiḥ // AMsa_16.65 //
SA20asmahsbu:3228: vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvaśuklagaṇasya madhye iti sarvakuśaladharmaprādhānyaṃ vīryasya nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3231: vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatā ca siddhir iti karma nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3233: sarvā ca lokottarā siddhir laukikī ca kriyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3234: vīryāvad avāptaṃ bhavabhogam iṣṭaṃ vīryeṇa śuddhiṃ prabalām upetāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3235: vīryeṇa satkāyam atītya muktā vīryeṇa bodhiṃ paramāṃ vibuddhāḥ // AMsa_16.66 //
SA20asmahsbu:3239: punar mataṃ hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ mokṣādhipaṃ pakṣavipakṣam anyat /
SA20asmahsbu:3240: tattve praviṣṭaṃ parivartakaṃ ca vīryaṃ mahārthaṃ ca niruktam anyat // AMsa_16.67 //
SA20asmahsbu:3241: saṃnāhavīryaṃ prathamaṃ tataś ca prayogavīryaṃ vidhivatprahitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3242: alīnam akṣobhyam atuṣṭivīryaṃ sarvaprakāraṃ pravadanti buddhāḥ // AMsa_16.68 //
SA20asmahsbu:3244: tatra hānivivṛddhivīryaṃ samyakprahāṇeṣu ca dvayoḥ kuśaladharmābhivṛddhaye /
SA20asmahsbu:3258: sthāmavān vīryavānutsāhī dṛḍhaparākramo anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv ity ucyate yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3260: līnātyudārāśayabuddhiyogāt vīryaṃ tad alpārthamahārtham iṣṭam // AMsa_16.69 //
SA20asmahsbu:3262: yānatraye prayukto yo janas tadāśrayeṇa yathākramaṃ nikṛṣṭamadhyottamaṃ vīryaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3265: līno hi buddhyāśayo yānadvaye prayuktānāṃ kevalātmārthādhikārāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3267: ata eva yathākramaṃ vīryaṃ ta dalpārthaṃ mahārtham iva svārthādhikārāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3268: na vīryavān bhogaparājito 'sti no vīryavān kleśaparājito 'sti /
SA20asmahsbu:3269: na vīryavān khedaparājito 'sti no vīryavān prāptiparājito 'sti // AMsa_16.70 //
SA20asmahsbu:3271: caturvidho dānādīnāṃ vibandho yena dānādiṣu na pravartate /
SA20asmahsbu:3278: anyonyaṃ saṃgrahataḥ prabhedato dharmato nimittāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3279: ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ viniścayaḥ sarvathā jñeyaḥ // AMsa_16.71 //
SA20asmahsbu:3281: abhayapradānena śīlakṣāntisaṃgraho yasmāt tābhyām abhayaṃ dadāti /
SA20asmahsbu:3282: dharmadānena dhyānaprajñayor yasmāt tābhyāṃ dharmaṃ dadāti /
SA20asmahsbu:3287: dānaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ dānadānaṃ śīladānaṃ yāvat prajñādānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3290: ye sūtrādayo yeṣu dānādiṣv artheṣu saṃdṛśyante /
SA20asmahsbu:3291: ye ca dānādayo yeṣu sūtrādiṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante /
SA20asmahsbu:3296: śīlam api dānādīnāṃ bhikṣusaṃvarasamādānaṃ sarvasvaparigrahatyāgāc chīlapratiṣṭhitasya ca kṣāntyādiyogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3304: dānaṃ samam iṣyate yathā pāramitāsu priyākhyānaṃ taddeśanā /
SA20asmahsbu:3306: tac chabdena pāramitānāṃ grahaṇāt pāramitādeśanā pāramitāsamādāpanety arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3307: samānārthatā yatra paraṃ samādāpayati tatra svayam anuvṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3308: kim arthaṃ punar etāni catvāri saṃgrahavastūnīṣyante /
SA20asmahsbu:3319: yathāvāditathākāriṇaṃ hi samādāpakaṃ viditvā yatra kuśale tena pravartitāḥ pare bhavanti tad anuvartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3329: yad apy anyat saṃgrahavastudvayam uktaṃ bhagavatā āmiṣasaṃgraho dharmasaṃgrahaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3337: abandhyaḥ sarvathā caiva jñeyo hy ākārabhedataḥ // AMsa_16.76 //
SA20asmahsbu:3339: tatra hīnamadhyottamaḥ saṃgraho bodhisatvānāṃ yānatrayaprayukteṣu veditavyo yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3342: avandhyaḥ sarvathā aṣṭamyādiṣu bhūbhiṣu satvārthasyāvaśyaṃ saṃpādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3344: sarvārthasiddhau sarveṣāṃ sukhopāyaś ca śasyate // AMsa_16.77 //
SA20asmahsbu:3345: ye kecit parṣatkarṣaṇe prayuktāḥ sarvais tair ayam evopāyaḥ samāśrito yaduta catvāri saṃgrahavastūni /
SA20asmahsbu:3346: tathā hi sarvārthasiddhaye sarveṣāṃ sukhaś caiṣa upāyaḥ praśasyate buddhaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3348: sarve ta evaṃ tasmāc ca vartma tat satvapācane // AMsa_16.78 //
SA20asmahsbu:3349: etena lokatraye 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ paripācane caturṇāṃ saṃgrahavastūnām ekāyanamārgatvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3352: bhavaviṣayanimittanirvikalpo bhavati sa satvagaṇasya saṃgṛhītā // AMsa_16.79 //
SA20asmahsbu:3353: etena yathoktāsu ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu sthitasya bodhisatvasya saṃgrahavastuprayoga darśayati svaparārthasaṃpādanāt pāramitābhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiś ca yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3364: upadheś cittataś cānyā adhimukter nidhānataḥ // AMsa_17.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:3366: vastvābhogāvabodhāc ca vimukteś ca tathātvataḥ // AMsa_17.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:3369: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā // AMsa_17.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:3379: tathoktaiś cādhimuktyādibhir yad uta mahāyānadharmādhimuktaḥ bodhicittotpādataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3380: praṇidhānam eva hi nidhānam atroktaṃ ślokavattvānurodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3389: tathā tv ato mahābodhiprāpter ity ayaṃ pūjāyāḥ prakārabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3390: hetutaḥ phalataś caiva ātmanā ca parair api /
SA20asmahsbu:3391: lābhasatkārataś caiva pratipatter dvidhā ca sā // AMsa_17.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:3393: parīttā mahatī pūjā samānāmānikā ca sā /
SA20asmahsbu:3394: prayogād gatitaś caiva praṇidhānāc ca sā matā // AMsa_17.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:3396: tatrātītā hetuḥ pratyutpannā phalaṃ pratyutpannā hetur anāgatā phalam ity evaṃ hetuphalato 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3401: punaḥ samānā hīnā nirmānā praṇītā trimaṇḍalāvikalpanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3406: punar yāṃ pūjām āyatyāṃ prayojayituṃ praṇidadhāti sā dūre yāṃ praṇihitaḥ kartuṃ sāntike /
SA20asmahsbu:3407: katamā punar buddhapūjā paramā veditavyety āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3408: buddheṣu pūjā paramā svacittāt dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3410: ity ebhiḥ pañcabhir ākāraiḥ svacittapūjā buddheṣu paramā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3414: atṛptavipulam uditopakaranirlepakalyāṇāśayaiś ca ye pāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3421: hetuto jñānataḥ kṣetrān niśrayāc ca pradarśitā // AMsa_17.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:3422: mitraṃ śrayed dāntaśamopaśāntaṃ guṇādhikaṃ sodyamam āgamāḍhyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3423: prabuddhatatvaṃ vacas ābhyupetaṃ kṛpātmakaṃ khedavivarjitaṃ ca // AMsa_17.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:3428: guṇair adhikaṃ na samaṃ vā nyūnaṃ vā /
SA20asmahsbu:3436: satkāralābhaiḥ paricaryayā ca seveta mitraṃ pratipattitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3439: dharme tathājñāśaya eva dhīmān mitraṃ pragacchet samaye nataś ca // AMsa_17.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:3444: satkāralābheṣu gataspṛho 'sau prapattaye taṃ pariṇāmayec ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3445: iti pariṇāmanā pratipattyarthaṃ sevanān na lābhasatkārārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3446: yathānuśiṣṭapratipattitaś ca saṃrādhayec cittam ato 'sya dhīraḥ // AMsa_17.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:3449: yānatraye kauśalam etya buddhyā svasyaiva yānasya yateta siddhau /
SA20asmahsbu:3451: satvān ameyān paripācanāya kṣetrasya śuddhasya ca sādhanāya // AMsa_17.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:3453: aprameyāś ca satvāḥ pariśuddhaṃ ca buddhakṣetraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3456: dharmeṣu dāyād aguṇena yukto naivāmiṣeṇa pravesat sa mitram /
SA20asmahsbu:3460: ata ūrdhvamadhyardhena ślokena prakārabhedaḥ sevāyā veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3461: hetoḥ phalād dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ bahitaś ca dhīmān // AMsa_17.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:3463: hetoḥ phalād ity atītādibhedataḥ pūrvavat dharmamukhānuyānāt seveta mitraṃ (Msa 121)
SA20asmahsbu:3465: dharmamukhasroto hi dharmamukhānuyānaṃ bahirdhā bahitaḥ śrutaśravāc cetasi yogataś cety audārikasūkṣmabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3469: gatiprayogapraṇidhānataś ca kalyāṇamitraṃ hi bhajet dhīmān // AMsa_17.15 //
SA20asmahsbu:3471: katamā punaḥ paramā seveti saptamaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3476: brāhmā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatāś ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:3488: punaḥ katamasmin satvanikāye dharme vā pravartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3490: saukhyārthini duḥkhārte sukhite kliṣṭe ca te pravartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3491: taddeśite ca dharme tat tathatāyāṃ ca dhīrāṇām // AMsa_17.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:3492: satvālambanāḥ sukhārthini yāvat kliṣṭe satvanikāye pravartante /
SA20asmahsbu:3500: te hy avikalpatvād anālambanā ivety anālambanāḥ / api khalu /
SA20asmahsbu:3502: karmadvayād anālambā maitrī kleśakṣayād api // AMsa_17.19 //
SA20asmahsbu:3504: ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇair anālambanā maitrī veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3512: manomayānāṃ granthānāṃ prahāṇād ucchidyate ālambanam iti vacanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3513: te niścalāś ca calāś ca kṛpaṇair āsvāditā na ca jñeyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3514: te ca brāhmyā vihārāś caturvidhā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3523: hīnāśayāḥ samānā hīnās te hy anyathā tv adhikāḥ // AMsa_17.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:3531: ye 'nutpattikadharmakṣāntirahitā hīnās te mṛdukā ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3532: anyathā tv adhikā iti yathoktaviparyayeṇādhimātratā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:3533: brāhmyair vihṛtavihāraḥ kāmiṣu saṃjāyate yadā dhīmān /
SA20asmahsbu:3534: saṃbhārān pūrayate satvāṃś ca vipācayati tena // AMsa_17.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:3535: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyai rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇa /
SA20asmahsbu:3536: tatpratyayair api bhṛśair na yāti vikṛtiṃ pramatto 'pi // AMsa_17.23 //
SA20asmahsbu:3538: tatra brāhmyair vihṛto vihārair iti hetuḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3543: sarvatra cāvirahito brāhmyair vihārair jāyata iti niṣpandaphalaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3544: rahitaś ca tadvipakṣeṇeti visaṃyogaphalaṃ bhṛśair api tatpratyayair avikṛtigamanaṃ liṅgaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3548: yukto hi bodhisatvo bahuvidham ādīnavaṃ spṛśati // AMsa_17.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:3553: kleśair hantyātmānaṃ satvān upahanti śīlam upahanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3556: prāptāprāptavihīno manasi mahad duḥkham āpnoti // AMsa_17.26 //
SA20asmahsbu:3557: tatra prathamais tribhiḥ padair ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābādhāyobhayavyābādhāyety etam ādīnavaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3558: savilekhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ padair dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3563: digvidikṣu cāsya pāpako 'varṇaśabdaśloko niścaratīty evaṃ savilekho yāvad ayaśas vīty anena yathākramaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3564: śeṣais tribhiḥ padair yathākramaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavati /
SA20asmahsbu:3565: tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity etad ādīnavaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3566: ete sarve doṣā maitryādiṣu susthitasya na bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3567: akliṣṭaḥ saṃsāraṃ satvārthaṃ no ca saṃtyajati // AMsa_17.27 //
SA20asmahsbu:3570: na tathaikaputrakeṣv api guṇavatsv api bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3573: ity ete ca bodhisatvamaitrādīnāṃ tīvratāṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3580: śatruvaśagā mārakṛtāntarāyāḥ kuśale 'prayuktāḥ duḥkhākrāntāḥ duḥkhābhūtā narakādiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3593: ity ete daśavidhāḥ satvā bodhisatvakaruṇāyā ālambanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3595: heṭhāpahaṃ hy uttamabodhibījaṃ sukhāvahaṃ tāyapakam iṣṭahetuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3596: svabhāvadaṃ dharmam upāśritasya bodhir na dūre jinātmajasya // AMsa_17.31 //
SA20asmahsbu:3602: evaṃ pañcavidhāṃ karuṇām āśritya buddhatvam adūre veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3604: vijñāya saṃsāragataṃ samagraṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ caiva nirātmakaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3605: nodvegam āyāti na cāpi doṣaiḥ prabādhyate kāruṇiko 'grabuddhiḥ // AMsa_17.32 //
SA20asmahsbu:3606: sarvaṃ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñāya bodhisatvo nodvegam āyāti kāruṇikatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3608: evaṃ nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhito bhavati na saṃsāre yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3610: duḥkhātmakaṃ lokam avekṣamāṇo duḥkhāyate vetti ca tadyathāvat /
SA20asmahsbu:3611: tasyābhyupāyaṃ parivarjane ca na khedam āyaty api vā kṛpāluḥ // AMsa_17.33 //
SA20asmahsbu:3613: vetti ca tad yathāvad iti duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tasya ca duḥkhasya parivarjane 'bhyupāyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3615: etena jānann api saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ tatparityāgopāyaṃ ca na khedam āpadyate bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāviśeṣād iti pradarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3617: kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3618: vipakṣahīnā ca viśuddhilābhāt caturvidheyaṃ karūṇātmakānāṃ // AMsa_17.34 //
SA20asmahsbu:3624: na sā kṛpā yā na samā sadā vā nādhyāśayād vā pratipattito vā /
SA20asmahsbu:3625: vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisatvo hy akṛpas tathā yaḥ // AMsa_17.35 //
SA20asmahsbu:3626: tatra samā sukhitādiṣu yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
SA20asmahsbu:3634: karuṇā tarur eṣa mahān mūlādiḥ puṣpapatraphalaḥ // AMsa_17.36 //
SA20asmahsbu:3642: mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:3643: duḥkhākṣamaś ca dhīmān satvārthaṃ cintayen naiva // AMsa_17.37 //
SA20asmahsbu:3646: śubhajanmān anugacchan satvān paripācayen naiva // AMsa_17.38 //
SA20asmahsbu:3647: ābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pūrvottaraprasavasādharmyāt karuṇādīnāṃ mūlādibhāvaṃ sādhayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3654: tasyāḥ seko maitrī tayā tadāpy āyanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3656: tataś ca karuṇodbhavaduḥkham utpadyate bodhisatvasya svārthaprayuktasya tatra saukhyotpādād vipulapuṣṭiḥ kṣāntipuṣṭir ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3663: ādhyātmikapratyayasiddhitaḥ svasaṃtānaparipākāt puṣpam iva janmābandhyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3666: kaḥ kurvīta na karuṇāṃ satveṣu mahākṛpāguṇakareṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3667: duḥkhe 'pi saukhyam atulaṃ bhavati yad eṣāṃ kṛpājanitaṃ // AMsa_17.41 //
SA20asmahsbu:3671: aviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3672: kuta eva lokasaukhye svajīvite vā bhavet snehaḥ // AMsa_17.42 //
SA20asmahsbu:3673: sarvasya hi lokasya laukike saukhye svajīvite ca snehaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3674: tatrāpi ca niḥsnehānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sarvaduḥkhopaśame nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhitaṃ manaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3676: tu karuṇāviṣṭatvān nirvāṇe 'pi mano na pratiṣṭhitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3679: sneho na vidyate 'sau yo 'niravadyo na laukiko yaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3683: bodhisatvānāṃ tu karuṇāmayaḥ sneho niravadyaś ca laukikātikrāntaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3684: kathaṃ ca punar niravadya ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3686: uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ katham iva na syāt sa niravadyaḥ // AMsa_17.44 //
SA20asmahsbu:3690: sneho na so 'sty arihatāṃ loke pratyekabodhibuddhānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3691: prāg eva tad anyeṣāṃ katham iva lokottaro na syāt // AMsa_17.45 //
SA20asmahsbu:3696: saṃtrāsayati tad ādau spṛṣṭaṃ tv abhinandayati gāḍhaṃ // AMsa_17.46 //
SA20asmahsbu:3698: satveṣu karuṇayā bodhisatvānāṃ yad duḥkham utpadyate tadādau saṃtrāsayati adhimukticaryābhūmau /
SA20asmahsbu:3700: spṛṣṭaṃ tu śuddhādhyāśayabhūmāv abhinandayaty evety arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3702: kim ataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyam abhibhavati sarva /
SA20asmahsbu:3703: kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ // AMsa_17.47 //
SA20asmahsbu:3704: nāsty ata āścaryataraṃ yad duḥkham eva karuṇājanitaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ tathā sukhaṃ (Msa 128) bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:3706: yena sukhena vimuktā arhanto 'pi kṛtārthāḥ prāg evānye /
SA20asmahsbu:3708: kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yad dānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3709: traidhātukam upabhogair na tatsukhaṃ tatkalāṃ spṛśati // AMsa_17.48 //
SA20asmahsbu:3710: yacca traidhātukaṃ sukham upabhogaiḥ kṛtaṃ na tatsukhaṃ tasya sukhasya kalāṃ spṛśatīty ayam uttarārdhasyārthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3713: duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3714: parahitahetor duḥkhaṃ kiṃ kārūṇikair na samupetam // AMsa_17.49 //
SA20asmahsbu:3718: karūṇā dānaṃ bhogāḥ sadā kṛpālor vivṛddhim upayānti /
SA20asmahsbu:3719: snehānugrahajanitaṃ tac chaktikṛtaṃ sukhaṃ cāsmāt // AMsa_17.50 //
SA20asmahsbu:3724: tasmāc ca trayāt phalaṃ trividhaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:3729: vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi /
SA20asmahsbu:3730: ākarṣāmi nayāmi ca karuṇāsannān pravadatīva // AMsa_17.51 //
SA20asmahsbu:3740: duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhāny anādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3741: sukhayaty ātmānam ataḥ kṛpālur ādhāya parasaukhyam // AMsa_17.52 //
SA20asmahsbu:3742: karuṇayā bodhisatvaḥ paraduḥkhair duḥkhitaḥ satveṣv anādhāya sukhaṃ kathaṃ sukhitaḥ (Msa 129) syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3743: tasmāt pareṣu sukham ādhāya bodhisatva ātmānam eva sukhayatīti veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3745: svaṃ dānaṃ kāruṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3746: bhogaiḥ sukhaya paraṃ vā māma py ayutasaukhyam // AMsa_17.53 //
SA20asmahsbu:3747: na hi kāruṇikasya vinā parasukhenāsti sukhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3748: tasyāyutasaukhyatvād bodhisatvas tena vinā no dānasya phalaṃ sukhaṃ necchati /
SA20asmahsbu:3749: saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tan me satveṣu tat sukhasukhena /
SA20asmahsbu:3750: phala teṣv eva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti // AMsa_17.54 //
SA20asmahsbu:3751: dānaṃ dadatā dānaṃ ca dānaphalaṃ ca tanmayā satveṣu dattaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3753: atas teṣv eva yāvat phalitavyaṃ tāvat phaleti loṭ /
SA20asmahsbu:3756: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ // AMsa_17.55 //
SA20asmahsbu:3760: na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me yad bhogās tathopatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:3761: yasmād ahaṃ dāne pāraṃparas tatprabandhakāmatvān na sukhe /
SA20asmahsbu:3763: nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitā 'syeti // AMsa_17.56 //
SA20asmahsbu:3764: yo 'haṃ dānaphalaṃ sarvam eva karuṇayā nityaṃ parityajāmi nanv ata eva veditavyaṃ nāsti me dānaphalenārthitvam iti bodhisatvo dānaṃ samanuśāsti /
SA20asmahsbu:3765: dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cet tatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3767: kṣaṇam api dānena vinā dānābhirato bhavati naiva // AMsa_17.57 //
SA20asmahsbu:3769: akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmāt pratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3771: yas tvā karoti tasya tvaṃ phalasi /
SA20asmahsbu:3774: pratikāranirvyapekṣaḥ paratra phalado 'sya kāmaṃ te // AMsa_17.58 //
SA20asmahsbu:3777: niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāv ahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3784: nirmṛgyam ayācamāne 'py arthitvaṃ vighātaṃ vāvagamya svayam eva dānāt dakṣiṇīyāparimārgaṇāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3787: sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3799: na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3801: tatra sukhatrayaṃ dānaprītiḥ parānugrahaprītiḥ bodhisaṃbhārasaṃbharaṇaprītiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3812: eṣu pāramitāvipakṣadharmāvasthiteṣu yā karuṇā sā kṛpaṇādikaruṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:3817: karuṇā bodhisatvānāṃ hetor mitrāt svabhāvataḥ // AMsa_17.63 //
SA20asmahsbu:3819: trividhāṃ vedanām ālambya tisṛbhir duḥkhatābhiḥ karuṇāyanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3820: aduḥkhāsukhā hi vedanā sukhaduḥkhayor anvayaḥ punas tadāvāhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3821: uttarārdhena yathākramaṃ hetumitrasvabhāvaiḥ karuṇāyā hetvadhipatisamanantarapratyayān saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3824: pratipatter virāgāc ca nopalambhād viśuddhitaḥ // AMsa_17.64 //
SA20asmahsbu:3825: tatra samā trividhavedanāvastheṣu yat kiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viditvā /
SA20asmahsbu:3832: āśayato 'pi vibhutvād avikalpād aikyataś cāpi // AMsa_17.65 //
SA20asmahsbu:3836: etena yathoktānāṃ pūjāsevā'pramāṇānām anukramaṃ guṇaṃ ca samāsena saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3837: mahopadhibhir dhruvaṃ satkriyā cātyarthaṃ pūjanān mahadupadhidhruvasatkriyābhipūjī veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3847: lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
SA20asmahsbu:3849: etena svabhāvasahāyālambhanakarmapadā caturvidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bodhisatvalajjāyāḥ saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3855: tasyām eva lajjāpāramitāvipakṣavṛddhyā tatpratipakṣaparihāṇyā cātyarthaṃ lajjotpādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3859: kleśānukuleṣu dharmeṣv indriyāguptadvāratvādiṣu ca prayogena lajjotpādanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:3861: hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tv adhikā // AMsa_18.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:3864: ataḥ paraṃ caturbhis tribhiś ca ślokair yathākramaṃ lajjāvipakṣe lajjāyāṃ ca doṣaguṇabhedaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3866: pratighopekṣāmānaḥ satvān upahanti śīlaṃ ca // AMsa_18.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:3868: ity atra ātmavyābādhāya cetayate paravyābadhāyobhayavyābhādhāya cety saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3872: kaukṛtyāt savilekho bhavati sa saṃmānahānim āpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:3873: śrāddhāt mānuṣasaṃghāc chāstrā copekṣyate tasmāt // AMsa_18.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:3876: ity etena dṛṣṭadhārmikam avadyaṃ prasavatīti darśanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3882: ity anena dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavatīty saṃdarśitam prāptakuśaladharmaparihānitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3884: duḥkhaṃ viharati tasmān manaso 'py asvasthatām eti // AMsa_18.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:3885: ity etena lajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3886: ete sarve doṣā hrīmatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:3888: yad ete ca doṣā na bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:3889: deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ // AMsa_18.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:3891: saṃbhārāṃś ca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān /
SA20asmahsbu:3893: satvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ // AMsa_18.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:3896: sa vipakṣapratipakṣai rahito 'rahitaś ca jāyate satataṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3899: ity etam ānuśaṃsaṃ hrīmān āpnoti jinaputraḥ // AMsa_18.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:3900: iti yathoktadoṣābhāvaṃ guṇayogaṃ ca prāpnotīti saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3901: doṣamalino hi bālo hrīvirahāt suvasanaiḥ sugupto 'pi /
SA20asmahsbu:3906: ākāśam iva na lipto hrīyuktaḥ jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3908: hrībhūṣitaś ca śobhati saṃparkagato jinasutānām // AMsa_18.12 //
SA20asmahsbu:3910: mātur iva vatsalatvaṃ hriyo vineyeṣu bodhisatvānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3912: ārakṣā cāpi hrīḥ saṃsaratāṃ sarvadoṣebhyaḥ // AMsa_18.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:3914: ebhir vastrādidṛṣṭāntair vihāre kleśapratipakṣatāṃ cāre lokadharmapratipakṣatāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3918: sarveṣu ca pravṛttir hrīvihitaṃ hrīmato liṅgam // AMsa_18.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:3920: etena caturvidhaṃ hrīkṛtaṃ liṅgam hrīmato darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3921: yad uta sarvadoṣeṣv anadhivāsanā cāpravṛttiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3924: āśayato 'pi vibhutvād akalpanād aikyataś cāpi // AMsa_18.15 //
SA20asmahsbu:3928: dṛḍhatvena ca sarvebhyas tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // AMsa_18.16 //
SA20asmahsbu:3929: vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca satvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā /
SA20asmahsbu:3930: nirbhīto bodhisatvo hi trayād yasmāt pravartate // AMsa_18.17 //
SA20asmahsbu:3935: katamasmāt trayān nirbhītaḥ pravartate ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:3936: līnatvāc ca calatvāc ca mohāc cotpadyate bhayaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3937: kṛtyeṣu tasmād vijñeyā dhṛtisaṃjñā nije traye // AMsa_18.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:3938: sravakāryeṣu hi līnacittatayā vā bhayam utpadyate tadanutsāhataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:3942: tasmān nijavīryāditraye dhṛtisaṃjñā veditavyā nija ity apratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīye
SA20asmahsbu:3943: prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3946: duṣkareṣu vicitreṣu saṃsārātyāga eva ca // AMsa_18.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:3947: niḥsaṃkleśe ca tatraiva dhṛtir dhīrasya jāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:3948: asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ mataḥ // AMsa_18.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:3962: śalabhaiḥ pakṣavātaiś ca samudraiś ca sumeruvat // AMsa_18.22 //
SA20asmahsbu:3969: aniṣpannaś ca niṣpannaḥ suniṣpannaś ca bhūmiṣu // AMsa_18.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:3977: tābhyāṃ hi khedotpattito lajjayate na cotpādayati /
SA20asmahsbu:3987: gṛhītā satvapākāya saddharmasya ca dhāraṇe // AMsa_18.26 //
SA20asmahsbu:3989: adhyātmavidyā hetuvidyā śabdavidyā cikitsāvidyā śilpakarmasthānavidyā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:3991: karma prathamavastuni svayaṃ pratipattiḥ parebhyaś ca tatsamākhyānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:3996: lakṣaṇaṃ śāstrajñatāyā etāny evas pañca vastuni śrutāni bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4008: sā punar eṣā śāstrajñatā bodhisatvānāṃ samādhimukhair dhāraṇīmukhaiś ca saṃgṛhītā /
SA20asmahsbu:4014: lokajñatā hi dhīrāṇāṃ tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // AMsa_18.27 //
SA20asmahsbu:4019: sā punaḥ kim artham ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4025: dvayād astaṃgamas tasmāt tajjño lokajña ucyate // AMsa_18.29 //
SA20asmahsbu:4026: dvābhyāṃ satyābhyāṃ lokasya udayaḥ punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāro yaś codayo yena ceti kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsbu:4031: śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4032: satyajñānād yato dhīmān lokajño hi nirucyate // AMsa_18.30 //
SA20asmahsbu:4038: prāmāṇikaś ca nītārtho nirjalpā prāptir asya ca // AMsa_18.31 //
SA20asmahsbu:4040: tatra prāmāṇika 'rtho yaḥ pramāṇabhūtena nīto vibhaktaḥ śāstrā vā tatpramāṇīkṛtena vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4045: sābhilāṣasya ca prāpteḥ pratiṣedho 'tra deśitaḥ // AMsa_18.32 //
SA20asmahsbu:4046: prathame pratisaraṇe ārṣadharmapratikṣeptuḥ pudgalasya pratiṣedgo deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4051: adhimukter vicārāc ca yathāvat parataḥ śravāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4052: nirjalpād api ca jñānād apraṇāśo hi dhīmatāṃ // AMsa_18.33 //
SA20asmahsbu:4060: paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānāc ca tā matāḥ // AMsa_18.34 //
SA20asmahsbu:4061: prathamā paryāye jñānam ekaikasyārthastha yāvanto nāma paryāyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4063: tṛtīyā vākye pratyekaṃ janapadeṣu yā bhāṣāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4066: deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4067: dharmārthayor dvayor vācā jñānenaiva ca deśanā // AMsa_18.35 //
SA20asmahsbu:4071: deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4072: tatra jñānena prayojanaṃ kasya punar deśanā //
SA20asmahsbu:4077: dharmasyoddeśanirdeśāt vākyena deśanā tayor eva dvayor sarvathā prāpaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4079: ato yac ca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4082: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karam ca darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4083: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāṃ etya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃvid iti nirvacanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4088: yaś ca saṃbhāro yad arthaṃ ca saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4092: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4093: trayaṃ cānyad dvayasyāpi pañcāpi jñānasaṃbhṛtiḥ // AMsa_18.39 //
SA20asmahsbu:4098: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanāt sarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4099: saṃtatyā bhāvanām etya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
SA20asmahsbu:4100: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vīdhīre sarvārthasādhakaḥ // AMsa_18.40 //
SA20asmahsbu:4118: dhīmatām asamatvāt sā tadanyebhyo viśiṣyate // AMsa_18.42 //
SA20asmahsbu:4120: niśrayāt pratipakṣāc ca avatārāt tathaiva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4124: ity ebhiś caturdaśabhir ākārair bodhisatvānāṃ smṛtyupastānabhāvanā viśiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4125: katham āśrayato mahāyāne śrutacintābhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām āśritya /
SA20asmahsbu:4126: kathaṃ pratipakṣataḥ caturviparyāsapratipakṣāṇām apy aśuciduḥkhānityānātmasaṃjñānaṃ pratipakṣatvāt kāyādidharmanairātmyapraveśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4128: caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair yathākramaṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyāvatārāt svayaṃ pareṣāṃ cāvatāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4133: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃ yogāya nāvasaṃyogāya /
SA20asmahsbu:4135: katham anuvṛttitaḥ laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ cānuvṛttyā tadupasaṃhitasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāt tebhyas tadupadeśārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4141: katham utpattitaḥ saṃcintyabhavopapattau cakravartyādibhūtasya viśiṣṭakāyavedanādisaṃpattau tadasaṃkleśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4142: kathaṃ mātrataḥ mṛdvā api smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyās tad anyebhyo adhimātratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4145: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4151: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4154: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu // AMsa_18.46 //
SA20asmahsbu:4156: satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ // AMsa_18.47 //
SA20asmahsbu:4157: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4170: ye (Msa 142) ca vipakṣās teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4179: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate /
SA20asmahsbu:4180: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyatge /
SA20asmahsbu:4183: yac chamathapragrahopakleśayor layāuddhatyayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa vīryam ārabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:4186: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4189: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaś ca parasya ca // AMsa_18.50 //
SA20asmahsbu:4190: sarvārthasiddhir laukikī lokottarā ca veditavyā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4192: niśrayāc ca prabhedāc ca upāyād abhinirhṛteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4196: upāyaś cābhinirhāraḥ ṣaḍvidhaś ca vidhīyate // AMsa_18.52 //
SA20asmahsbu:4202: naibandhikas tṛtīyaś ca caturthaḥ prātipakṣikaḥ // AMsa_18.53 //
SA20asmahsbu:4204: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śaddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ
SA20asmahsbu:4206: praśrabdhir anugrahātmakaḥ smṛtiḥ saṃ prajanyaṃ copanibandhakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4213: praṇidher vaśitāyaś ca dharmaprāpteś ca nirhṛtiḥ // AMsa_18.54 //
SA20asmahsbu:4214: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4216: tābhir upasaṃkramya bhāṣā cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4217: sthitivikrīḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisatvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4218: praṇidhir yena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisatvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4219: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre /
SA20asmahsbu:4220: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4224: bodhiś caryā śruta cātra śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4226: śraddhendriyasya bodhiḥ padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4240: etena yasyām avasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4241: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhād yathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4251: dharmālokavivṛddhyā ca prītyā āpūryate dhruvam // AMsa_18.59 //
SA20asmahsbu:4253: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prīṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4263: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisatvaḥ yathākāmaṃ sarvatra viharati tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena ca vihāreṇānyasyopagamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4265: yathā cakravartinaḥ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam upanetavyaṃ copapraṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4267: tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ paraiti /
SA20asmahsbu:4273: etena yad bodhyaṅgaṃ yathāṅgaṃ tad abhidyatitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4285: jñeyāvṛtteś ca mārgasya vaiśeṣikaguṇasya ca // AMsa_18.65 //
SA20asmahsbu:4288: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśas tena tadrthāvabodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4291: pratipakṣasya bhāvanā bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ (Msa 146)
SA20asmahsbu:4292: hi kālaṃ akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4293: samyaksmṛtyā śamathapragrahopekṣānimitteṣu layāuddhatyābhāvān mārgasaṃmukhībhāvāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4294: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayaty evam aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante /
SA20asmahsbu:4296: cittasya citte sthānāc ca dharmapravicayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:4297: samyak sthitim upāśritya śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā // AMsa_18.66 //
SA20asmahsbu:4299: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayād yathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4300: na tu vinā samyaksamādhinety etac chamathavipaśyanālakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4302: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇam ākaṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4304: ākaṅkṣed bhikṣur aho vatāhaṃ kāmair iti vistreṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāv eva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau /
SA20asmahsbu:4305: yad uta śamathaś vipaśyanā cety evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:4311: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hy asaṃskṛte // AMsa_18.67 //
SA20asmahsbu:4313: sarvabhūmigatā dhīre sa yogaḥ sarvasādhakaḥ // AMsa_18.68 //
SA20asmahsbu:4314: ity upaniṣan matety evamādinā śamathavipaśyanāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4321: saṃskāro hi saṃsṛtaṃ tad atra nāstīty asaṃskṛtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4322: tad eva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ c pariśodhayitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4324: tad etad yathākramaṃ pariśuddhir viśuddhiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4327: kṣipraprāptau kriyāśuddhau vartmācchede ca kauśalaṃ // AMsa_18.69 //
SA20asmahsbu:4330: yatkauśalyaṃ samāśritya sarvārthān sādhayanti te // AMsa_18.70 //
SA20asmahsbu:4334: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā /
SA20asmahsbu:4338: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisatvānām asamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalyam ity ayaṃ prabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4342: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ // AMsa_18.71 //
SA20asmahsbu:4346: prakāśayanti saddharmaṃ nityaṃ saṃdhārayanti ca // AMsa_18.73 //
SA20asmahsbu:4347: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4354: samādhinā mahatī sāpi mahatī punas trividhā /
SA20asmahsbu:4355: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ akuśalabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:4356: pariśuddhabhūmikā tv adhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ity ayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4359: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:4360: praṇidhānaṃ hi dhīrāṇām asamaṃ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_18.74 //
SA20asmahsbu:4361: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittāt sadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:4366: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4372: āyatyāṃ vābhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittāt punaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathārthasamṛddhitā vedutavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4374: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4375: citram adhimukticaryābhūmāv evaṃ ca syām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4377: viśuddhaṃ uttarottarāsu bhūmiṣu viśuddhiviśeṣād ā bodher ity eṣa prabhedataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4380: nairātmyaṃ dvividhaṃ jñeyo hy ātmagrāhasya cāśrayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4386: sa eva samādhis trividho jñeyo grāhyagrāhakabhāvataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4387: trividhasya grāhasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4388: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4390: nirvikalpo 'pi vimukho ratiyuktaś ca sarvadā // AMsa_18.78 //
SA20asmahsbu:4404: tatra saṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ity apraṇihitasya samādhyupaniṣatbhāvena deśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4407: kaḥ punar anityārtho yāvac chāntārthaḥ ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4409: vikalpopaśamārthaś ca dhīmatāṃ tac catuṣṭayam // AMsa_18.81 //
SA20asmahsbu:4411: yan nityaṃ nāsti tad anityaṃ teṣāṃ yat parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4414: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpata ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tv astīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4422: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskāram iti paścād vacanād iyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:4426: sā cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇam utpādanirodhau na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4427: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4428: tadanantaraṃ pravṛttir na syāt prabandhābhāvāt naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4430: hetuto hi sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam utpadyate bhavatīty arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4431: tad yadi bhūtvā punar uttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4433: na ca tat tenaiva hetunā bhavitum arhati tasyopayuktahetukatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4435: tasmāt pratikṣaṇam avaśyaṃ pūrvahetukam anyad bhavatīti veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4436: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo no yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4437: atha apy evam iṣyata notpannaṃ punar utpadyate yad arthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syād utapannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścān nirudhyate notpannamātram eveti /
SA20asmahsbu:4442: na hi virodhayos tulyo hetur upalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4449: māyopamās te bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikās tāvat kālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4451: te hi saṃskārāṇām udayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4452: anyathā hi teṣām api nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syur yathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyantāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4453: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayam eva vā tiṣṭhet svayam eva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4458: kkena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4461: athāpi syād vināpi sthitikāraṇena vināśakāraṇābhāvāt avatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:4462: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścād vināśayati agnineva śyāmateti /
SA20asmahsbu:4464: na hi vināśakāraṇaṃ paścād api kiṃcid asti /
SA20asmahsbu:4467: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatir visadṛśī gṛhyate ma tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4468: apām api kvathyamānānām agnisaṃbandhād alpataratamotpattito 'timandyād ante punar anutpattir gṛhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4470: ekāntikaṃ hy saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā yad uta saṃskṛtasyānityatā /
SA20asmahsbu:4472: kaṃcit kālam asyānityatā na syād iti anaikāntikam anityatālakṣaṇaṃ prasahyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4473: athāpi syāt pratikṣaṇam apūrvotpattau tad evedam iti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4474: tad bhavaty eva sādṛśasya anuvṛtter māyākārapalakavat /
SA20asmahsbu:4478: na hi tathaivāvasthitasyānte nirodhaḥ syād ādilakṣaṇanirviśiṣṭatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4479: tasmān na tat tad evety avadhāryate ante pariṇāmopalabdheś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4481: tad yadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhaved ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām ante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta /
SA20asmahsbu:4482: tasmād ādita evānyathātvam ārabdhaṃ yat krameṇābhivardhamānam ante vyaktim āpadyante kṣīrasyeva dadhyavasthāyāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4483: yāvat tu tad anyathātvaṃ sūkṣmatvān na paricchidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4484: tāvat sādṛśyānuvṛttes tad evedam imi jñāyata iti siddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4491: (Msa 151) kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāś cakṣūrūpādayo hetutaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4493: na tv akṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitum arhati yathā nityād anytyatam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4494: cittsya khalv api sarve saṃskārāḥ phalaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4497: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāś cakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmūrchnāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4498: tasmāt te cittasya phalaṃ cittasya cādhipatyaṃ saṃskāreṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:4500: cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4501: tathā viñānapratyayaṃ nāma rūpam ity uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4504: śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante /
SA20asmahsbu:4506: dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃś cittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇam adhimucyate tad apy asya tahaiva syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4509: tathā hi pāpakāreṣu satveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:4513: na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4514: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4515: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4521: cayāyāpārthād ayogāc ca āśrayatva asaṃbhavāt // AMsa_18.86 //
SA20asmahsbu:4525: anuvṛtteś ca cittasya kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam // AMsa_18.88 //
SA20asmahsbu:4526: ādyas taratamenāpi yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4536: viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4537: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu parinirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4542: abījatvena yas teṣām evārhataś caram eṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4544: yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ utpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4545: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyām utpattāv ādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumān aviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4547: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt tad uttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtter uttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4552: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:4557: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4559: na hi tiṣṭhaty āśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4560: yena tiṣṭhati ta ārūḍhānavasthānavad anyathā hy āśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:4563: ma hi tathāsthitasyaiva rāgādibhir vikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4564: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāv avināśe saty ante vikārābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4565: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
SA20asmahsbu:4566: na hi tahtāsthiteṣv eva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syād utpattiḥ sugatau vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4572: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatir nāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4573: sa hy utpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayed anutpannā vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4574: yad utpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcid gata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4575: athānutpannā tena asatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4576: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4580: na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārād anyopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4581: tasmān nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃtatyutpādād anyā gatiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4589: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyos tiryaggamanam agner ūrdhvaṃ jvalanam apāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4595: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvam antareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasmin kāle punar bījabhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4597: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvam abhyupagantuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4599: tathā hi caramatvam eva na saṃbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4602: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4605: śoṣavṛddheḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaḥ // AMsa_18.89 //
SA20asmahsbu:4609: cittānuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyam apy ataḥ // AMsa_18.91 //
SA20asmahsbu:4614: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍvidhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4619: tac cobhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na syāt paścād viśeṣakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4620: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4621: na hy avasthitasya calatvaṃ syāt tatsvabhāvād iti prasādhitam etat /
SA20asmahsbu:4624: tac chabenāpaś ca gṛhyante vāyuś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4625: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
SA20asmahsbu:4632: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ anyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4633: varṇagandharasasparśānāṃ pṛthivyādibhis tulyakāraṇatvāt tathaiva kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4635: (Msa 154) na hi tejasy utpanne tejaḥsahotpannam indhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:4636: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4638: ślokabadhānurodhād varṇādīnāṃ pūrvam abhidhānaṃ paścāt tejasaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4639: śabdaḥ punar yo 'pi kālāntaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭhādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ na hy asati kṣaṇikatve pratikṣaṇamandataratamopalabdhiḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4640: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham eva cittānuvṛtter yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4642: pṛcchrayate khalv api sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsbu:4644: kasmād bhavān anityatvam icchati na saṃskārārāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ necchatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:4645: yady evaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇam anyatvasyāgrahaṇād iti sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4646: prasiddhakṣaṇikabhāveṣv api pradīpādiṣu niścalāvasthāyāṃ tadagrahaṇād akṣaṇikatvaṃ kasmān neṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4647: yady evaṃ vadet pūrvavat paścād agrahaṇād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4650: yady evaṃ vadet vilakṣaṇatvāt pradīpāditadanyasaṃskārāṇām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4652: dvidhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4653: tad yadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyam abhipretam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4654: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaur vā gor iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4655: atha vṛttavailakṣaṇyam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpapradīpānāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4657: kaccid icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yānāruḍho gacched iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4660: cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tad āśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4661: yady evaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avathānam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4663: na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatter iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4664: yady evaṃ vadet sati kaṇikatve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmāt pradīpād iva kṣaṇikatvaṃ na siddham iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4666: sadṛśasaṃtatiprabandhavṛttyā hi kṣaṇikatvam eṣāṃ na prajñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4667: yataḥ saty apy aparāparatve tad evedam iti viparyāso jāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4668: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāt tadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punar vyavadānam ity evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4670: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsbu:4674: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4677: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4678: indhanāgnyor avācyatvam upalabdher dvayena hi // AMsa_18.95 //
SA20asmahsbu:4679: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4680: nairarthakyād ato draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate // AMsa_18.96 //
SA20asmahsbu:4681: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:4682: tatkarmalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyaṃ saṃbodho bādhyate tridhā // AMsa_18.97 //
SA20asmahsbu:4683: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:4686: darśanādiṣu yatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ na yujyate // AMsa_18.99 //
SA20asmahsbu:4687: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4688: tṛtīyapakṣābhāvāc ca pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate // AMsa_18.100 //
SA20asmahsbu:4690: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca // AMsa_18.101 //
SA20asmahsbu:4694: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā // AMsa_18.103 //
SA20asmahsbu:4695: pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ / āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4696: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsbu:4697: yataś ca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4698: evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve doṣāvakāśo na nāstitve /
SA20asmahsbu:4699: sa punar dravyato nāstīti kathaṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4701: na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat upalabdhir hi nāma buddhyā pratipattiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4702: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4704: dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānam nupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdhā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4705: na sa evam upalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4707: viparyāsāt tathā hy anātmany ātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā /
SA20asmahsbu:4708: tasmād ya evaṃ pudgalagrāho viparyāsaḥ saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4711: satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hy eṣa saṃkleśo yad uta ahaṃ mameti /
SA20asmahsbu:4712: na ca viparyāsaḥ saṃkleśo bhavitum arahati /
SA20asmahsbu:4713: na caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4717: yatra punar vastuni rūpādisaṃjñake prajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmāt kim ekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvid anyatvena / āha /
SA20asmahsbu:4723: ekatve hi skandhānām ātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4725: evaṃ hi pudgalsya prajñaptito 'stitvād avaktavyatvaṃ yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4727: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanam atikramya pudgalsya dravyato 'stitvam icchanti ta idaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4728: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4732: yathāgnir andhanān nānyo nānyo vaktavya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4734: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4736: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnir hi nāma tejodhātur indhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni /
SA20asmahsbu:4737: teṣāṃ ca bhinnaṃ lakṣaṇam ity anya evāgnir indhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4738: loke ca vināpy agninā dṛṣṭam indhanaṃ kāṣṭād vināpi cendhanenāgnir iti siddham anyatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4739: śāstre ca bhagavatā na kvacid agnīndhanayor avācyatvam uktam ity ayuktam etat /
SA20asmahsbu:4740: vinā punar indhanenāgnir astīti katham idaṃ vijñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4741: upalabdhes tathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūram api jvalat paraiti /
SA20asmahsbu:4742: athāpi syād vāyus tatrendhanam iti ata evāgnīndhanayor anyatvam it siddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4745: dvayaṃ hi tatropalabhyate arcir vāyuś cendhanatvena /
SA20asmahsbu:4746: asty eva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvad vijñāntā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā (Msa 157) ca /
SA20asmahsbu:4749: sa hi darśanādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4751: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4754: na hi tatra kiṃcit sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4755: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:4756: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavann aniṣṭaṃ vijñānam anityaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:4759: asau draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4766: tasmiṃś ca dravyata iṣyamāṇe buddhasya bhagavataḥ
SA20asmahsbu:4771: ni hi pudgalābhisaṃbodhe kiṃcid gambhīram abhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4777: api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvad vijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhaven niṣpratyatno vā /
SA20asmahsbu:4778: saprayatnasya vā punar asau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr vā bhaved ākasmikaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4780: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:4784: niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4787: ity asati vyāpare pudgalasya darśanādau katham asau draṣṭā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:4788: yāvad vijñātā doṣatrayād ity uktaṃ katamasmād doṣatrayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4791: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni /
SA20asmahsbu:4792: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudglaḥ karteti katham asau draṣṭā bhavati yāvad vijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācit prayatno na syād anityo na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:4793: nitye ca prayatne darśnādīnāṃyugapac ca nityaṃ ca pravṛrtiḥ syād iti doṣaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4794: tasmān na yujyate darśnādiṣu prayatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4795: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4798: tasya tathā sthitasya prayatnatvaṃ na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4800: sati hi tatprayatnatve na kadācit pudgalo nāstīti /
SA20asmahsbu:4801: kim arthaṃ prāk prayatno na syād yadā notpannaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4803: tṛtīyaś ca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yan na sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:4805: evaṃ tāvad yuktima āśritya dravyataḥ pudgalo nopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4807: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca //
SA20asmahsbu:4808_0: dharmoddāneṣu hi bhagavatā sarve dharmā anātmāna iti deśitaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyām
SA20asmahsbu:4808_1: asti karmāsti vipākaḥ kārakas tu nopalabhyate ya imaṃś ca skhandān nikṣipati anyāṃś
SA20asmahsbu:4811: ātmadṛṣṭir bhavati jīvadṛṣṭiḥ nirviśeṣo bhavati tīrthikaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4813: śūnyatāyām asya cittaṃ na praskandati na prasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate nādhimucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4816: pudgalo 'pi hi bhagavatā tatra tatra deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4817: (Msa 159) parijñātāvī bhārahāraḥ śraddhānusāryādipudgalavyavasthānata ity asati dravyato 'stitve kasmād deśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4821: pudgalaprajñaptim antareṇa tadvṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś ca deśayituṃ na śakyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4822: parijñāsūtre parijñeyā dharmāḥ saṃkleśaḥ parijñā vyavadānaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4826: tayor vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa parijñātāvībhārahārapudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4828: teṣāṃ vṛttibhedaḥ saṃtānabhedaś cāntareṇa śraddhānusāryādipudgalaprajñaptiṃ na śakyeta deśayituṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:4829: yenāsati dravyato 'stitve pudgalo deśita ity ayam atra nayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:4831: na hi tāvad asāv ātmadṛṣṭyutpādanārthaṃ yujyate yasmāt
SA20asmahsbu:4834: yadi cātmadarśanena mokṣa ity asau deśyeta /
SA20asmahsbu:4836: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathā hi sarveṣāṃ na dṛṣṭasatyānām ātmadarśanaṃ vidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:4838: na hi pūrvam ātmānam anātmato gṛhītvā satyābhisamayakāle kaścid ātmato gṛhṇāti /

SA20asmahsbu:5364_1: dhīratā duṣkaracaryādibhir akhedārthaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrasaṃdhinirmokṣaṇaṃ ca
SA20asmahsbu:5365: eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ liṅgānāṃ anukampā āśayato veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:5369: prakurvanti hi satvārthaṃ gṛhiṇaḥ sarvajanmasu // AMsa_20-21.3 //
SA20asmahsbu:5371: nidarśikā ca pravrajayā dhīmatāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.4 //
SA20asmahsbu:5372: aprameyair guṇair yuktaḥ pakṣaḥ pravrajitasya tu /
SA20asmahsbu:5373: gṛhiṇo bodhisatvād dhi yatis tasmād viśiṣyate // AMsa_20-21.5 //
SA20asmahsbu:5374: etena ślokena yādṛśe gṛhapakṣe sthito bodhisatvaḥ satvārthaṃ karoti tatparidīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5383: nirvāṇecchā ca dhīrāṇāṃ satveṣv āśaya iṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:5384: aśuddhaś ca viśuddhaś ca suviśuddhaḥ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.6 //
SA20asmahsbu:5387: paratreṣṭaphalecchā hitādhyāśayaḥ ihaiva kuśalapravṛttīcchā nirvāṇecchā tadubhayāhyāśaya eveti nānyo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5393: gaṇasya karṣaṇatvāc ca dhīmatāṃ sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.7 //
SA20asmahsbu:5394: caturvidhaḥ satvaparigraho bodhisatvānāṃ praṇidhānaparigraho veditavyo bodhicittena sarvasatvaparigrahaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5401: samādheś ca vibhutvasya cotpattir dhīmatāṃ matā // AMsa_20-21.8 //
SA20asmahsbu:5403: samādhyādhipatyena yā dhyānāni vyāvartya kāmadhātāv upapattiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5407: nirukteḥ prāptitaś caiva vihāro bhūmir eva ca // AMsa_20-21.9 //
SA20asmahsbu:5410: vihṛtya sasukhair dhyānair janma kāme tataḥ param // AMsa_20-21.10 //
SA20asmahsbu:5412: vinā ca cittasaṃkleśaṃ satvānāṃ paripācanā // AMsa_20-21.11 //
SA20asmahsbu:5416: satvapākasya niṣpattir jāyate ca tataḥ param // AMsa_20-21.13 //
SA20asmahsbu:5418: etasmāc ca vyavasthānād vijñeyaṃ bhūmilakṣaṇam // AMsa_20-21.14 //
SA20asmahsbu:5423: tṛtīyāyāṃ sātiśayasukhair bodhisatvadhyānair vihṛtyāparihīnasyaiva tebhyaḥ kāmadhātāv upapattiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5425: pañcamyāṃ caturāryasatyabahulavihāritayā vinātamanaś cittasaṃkleśena satvānāṃ paripācanāyāṃ nānāśāstraśilpapraṇayanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5429: aṣṭamyāṃ animitte 'py anābhogo nirabhisaṃskāra-animittavihāritvād buddhakṣetraviśodhanā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5433: bhūmiṣṭhe ca pudgalavibhāgam ārabhya dvau ślokau /
SA20asmahsbu:5436: upekṣakaḥ kṣetraviśodhakaś ca syāt satvapāke kuśalo maharddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5437: saṃpūrṇakāyaś ca nidarśane ca śakto 'bhiṣiktaḥ khalu bodhisatvaḥ // AMsa_20-21.16 //
SA20asmahsbu:5443: pañcamyāṃ saṃtānabhede nirmāṇo daśabhiś cittāśayaviśuddhisamatābhiḥ sarvasaṃtānasamatāpraveśāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5444: ṣaṣṭyāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānabhede nirmāṇaḥ pratītyasamutpādatathatābahulavihāritayā kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣābhyāṃ tathatāyāḥ saṃkleśvyavadānādarśanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5446: saptamyām ekakṣaṇalabdhabuddhir nirnimittavihārasāmarthyāt pratipakṣaṇaṃ saptatriṃśad bodhpakṣabhāvanātaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5447: aṣṭamyām upekṣakaḥ kṣetraviśodhakaś cānābhoganirnimittavihāritvād miśra-upamiśraprayogataś cāvinivartanīyabhūmipraviṣṭair bodhisatvaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5449: daśamyāṃ bodhisatvabhūmau bodhisatvo maharddhikaś ca vyavasthāpyate mahābhijñālābhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5450: saṃpūrṇakāyaś cāpramāṇasamādhidhāraṇīmukhasphuraṇād āśrayasya nidarśane ca śakto vyavasthāpyate tuṣitabhavanavāsādinirmāṇanidarśanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5454: adhicitte 'py adhiprajñe prajñā tu dvayagocarā // AMsa_20-21.17 //
SA20asmahsbu:5455: dharmatatvaṃ tadajñānajñānād yā vṛttir eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5456: prajñāyā gocaras tasmād dvibhūmau tadvyavasthitiḥ // AMsa_20-21.18 //
SA20asmahsbu:5458: śikṣāṇāṃ bhāvanāyāś ca phalam anyac caturvidham /
SA20asmahsbu:5461: kṣetraśuddhiś ca satvānāṃ pākaniṣpattir eva ca // AMsa_20-21.20 //
SA20asmahsbu:5463: caturvidhaṃ phalaṃ hy etat caturbhūmisamāśritam // AMsa_20-21.21 //
SA20asmahsbu:5464: prathamāyāṃ bhūmau dharmatāṃ pratividhya dvitīyāyām adhiśīlaṃ śikṣate /
SA20asmahsbu:5474: ataḥ paraṃ caturvidhaṃ śikṣāphalaṃ caturbhūmisamāśritaṃ veditavyaṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5475: tatra dvitīyaṃ phalaṃ sa evānimitto vihāro 'nabhisaṃskāraḥ kṣetraśuddhiś ca veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5482: tad anyāsv iti saptamyāṃ yāvad buddhabūmāv abhayor vimuktivimuktijñānayor viśodhanā /
SA20asmahsbu:5483: sā punar vimuktiś caturvidhaphalāvaraṇāc ca veditavyā pratighātāvaraṇāc ca buddhabhūmau /
SA20asmahsbu:5489: niṣpannā apy aniṣpannā niṣpannāś ca punar matāḥ // AMsa_20-21.24 //
SA20asmahsbu:5495: tatrādhimukticaryābhūmir aniṣpannā śeṣā niṣpannā ity etāḥ sarvabhūmayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5496: niṣpannā api punaḥ saptamāniṣpannāḥ śeṣā niṣpannā nirabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5497: yat punaḥ pramuditādibhūmir niṣpannā pūrvamuktā tatra niṣpattir yathāvyavasthāpitabhūmimanasikāreṇa /
SA20asmahsbu:5498: tasya bhūmivyavasthānasya kalpanāmātrajñānāt tad avikalpanā ca ca veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:5500: tad pai ca kalpanāmātraṃ na vikalpayaty evaṃ grāhyagrāhakāvikalpajñānalābhād bhūmipariniṣpattir uktā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:5501: api ca khalu bhūmīnāṃ bhāvanā ca niṣpattiś cobhayam acintyaṃ sarvabhūmiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:5502: tathā hi tad bodhisatvānāṃ pratyātmavedanīyaṃ buddhānāṃ ca viṣayo nānyeṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5504: adhimuktir hi sarvatra sālokā liṅgam iṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:5508: etadbhūmipraviṣṭasya bodhisatvasya daśavidhaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5509: yāṃ bhūmiṃ praviṣṭas tatra sāloko yāṃ na praviṣṭas tatrādhimuktir ity etad ekaṃ liṅgaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5513: sarvabhūmiprativedhaś ca tad abhinirhārakauśalyataḥ sarvasatveṣv ātmasamacittatā /
SA20asmahsbu:5517: buddhaparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu copapattiḥ sarvakālam ity etāni aparāṇi liṅgāni bodhisatvasya /
SA20asmahsbu:5519: nācchando na ca lubdhahrasvahṛdayo na krodhano nālaso nāmaitrīkarūṇāśayo na kumatiḥ kalpair vikalpair hataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5520: no vikṣiptamatiḥ sukhair na ca hato duḥkhair na vā vyāvartate satyaṃ mitram upāśritaḥ śrutaparaḥ pūjāparaḥ śāstari // AMsa_20-21.29 //
SA20asmahsbu:5521: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayaty aharaharyo hy uttamopāyavit /
SA20asmahsbu:5523: jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍaty abhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣām uparisthito guṇanidhir jñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ // AMsa_20-21.30 //
SA20asmahsbu:5543: dhīmatām anuśaṃso hi sarvathā sarvabhūmiṣu // AMsa_20-21.31 //
SA20asmahsbu:5550: dharmakāyaparipūripariniṣpattaye ca uttarād uttarataraṃ hetusaṃparigrahaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:5555: paśyatāṃ bodhim āsannāṃ satvārthasya ca sādhanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5556: tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate // AMsa_20-21.32 //
SA20asmahsbu:5560: dauḥśīlyam alasyānyayānamanasikāram alasya cātikramād vimalety ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:5561: tasmāt tarhy asmābhis tulyābhinirhāre sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīya iti vacanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5563: tathā hi tasyāṃ samādhibalenāpramāṇadharmaparyeṣaṇadhāraṇāt mahāntaṃ dharmāvabhāsaṃ pareṣāṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:5565: arciṣmatīti tadyogāt sā bhūmir dvayadāhataḥ // AMsa_20-21.34 //
SA20asmahsbu:5566: sā bodhipakṣātmikā prjñā dvayadahanapratyupasthānā tasyāṃ bāhulyena /
SA20asmahsbu:5567: dvayaṃ punaḥ kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ cātra veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5568: satvānāṃ paripākaś ca svacittasya ca rakṣaṇā /
SA20asmahsbu:5569: dhīmadbhir jīyate duḥkhaṃ durjayā tena kathyate // AMsa_20-21.35 //
SA20asmahsbu:5573: uktā hy abhimukhī bhūmiḥ prajñāpāramitāśrayāt // AMsa_20-21.36 //
SA20asmahsbu:5574: sā hi prajñāpāramitāśrayeṇa nirvāṇasaṃsārayor apratiṣṭhānāt saṃsāranirvāṇayor abhimukhī
SA20asmahsbu:5576: ekāyanapathaḥ pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭas tadupaśleṣatvāt dūraṃ gatā bhavati prayogapayantagamanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5578: dvābhyāṃ saṃjñābhyāṃ avicalanāt nimittasaṃjñayā animittābhogasaṃjñayā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5583: dvayavyāpter ity samādhimukhadhāraṇīmukhavyāpanān meghenevākāśasthālīyasyāśrayasaṃniviṣṭasya śrutadharmasya dharmameghety ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:5586: vividhakuśalābhinirhāranimittaṃ sadā sarvatra ratyā viharaṇād bodhisatvānāṃ bhūmayo vihārā ity ucyante /
SA20asmahsbu:5588: bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eveṣṭā hi bhūmayaḥ // AMsa_20-21.40 //
SA20asmahsbu:5589: bhūyo bhūyo 'mitāsv āsu ūrdhvaṃgamanayogād bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eva vihārāḥ punar bhūmaya ucyante /
SA20asmahsbu:5595: prativedhāc ca bhūmīnāṃ niṣpatteś ca caturvidhaḥ // AMsa_20-21.41 //
SA20asmahsbu:5598: caritalābho daśasu dharmacariteṣu ca vartanāt tasyām eva /
SA20asmahsbu:5609: (Msa 184) paripācanaṃ hy atra vinayanaṃ ca deśitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5622: jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.44 //
SA20asmahsbu:5630: atrāvaraṇāśeṣaṃ bhagavataḥ sarvasatvakleśavinayanād utpāditakleśeṣv api ca tatkleśapratipakṣavighānāt kliṣṭajanānukampayā saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:5631: anye hy araṇāvihāriṇaḥ satvānāṃ kasyacid eva tadālambanasya kleśasyotpattipratyayamātraṃ pratiharanti /
SA20asmahsbu:5635: sadaiva sarvapraśnānāṃ visarjaka namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.46 //
SA20asmahsbu:5636: atra pañcabhir ākārair praṇidhijñānaviśeṣaṃ bhagavataḥ saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:5648: āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
SA20asmahsbu:5649: avyāhatamate nityaṃ sudeśika namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.47 //
SA20asmahsbu:5650: atra samāsato yac ca deśyate yena deśyate tatra nityam avyāhatamatitvenabhagavataś catasraḥ pratisaṃvido deśitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5651: tatra dvayaṃ deśyate āśrayaś ca dharmaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5656: upetya vacanais teṣāṃ carijña āgatau gatau /
SA20asmahsbu:5657: niḥsāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.48 //
SA20asmahsbu:5658: atra ṣaḍbhir abhijñābhiḥ samyagavavādatvaṃ bhagavato darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5660: teṣāṃ bhāṣayā divyaśrotrābhijñayā cittacaritraṃ jñātvā cetaḥparyāyābhijñayā yathā pūrvāntād ihāgatir yathā ca saṃsārān niḥsāraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5664: dṛṣṭamātrāt prasādasya vidhāyaka namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.49 //
SA20asmahsbu:5665: atra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ bhagavati mahāpuruṣatvasaṃpratyayena darśanamātrāt prasādajanakatvaṃ karma saṃdarśayitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5669: atra bhagavataś caturvidhayā vaśitayā sarvākārāś catasraḥ pariśuddhayaḥ paridīpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5676: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.51 //
SA20asmahsbu:5677: atra caturṣv artheṣu satvānāṃ vipravādanaya māro yas tadbhañjakatvena bhagavato daśānāṃ balānāṃ karma saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5682: sthānāsthānajñānabalena hi bhagavān prathame 'rthe mārabhañjako veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5692: nirādhṛṣyatvād anyatīrthyair bhagavato yathākramaṃ caturvidhaṃ vaiśāradyam udbhāvitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5695: nirārakṣa asaṃmoṣa gaṇakarṣa namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.53 //
SA20asmahsbu:5696: anena trīṇy arakṣāṇi trīṇi ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhagavataḥ paridīpitāni /
SA20asmahsbu:5698: tair hi yathākramaṃ vigṛhyavaktā ca bhavati parṣatsu nirārakṣatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5703: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.54 //
SA20asmahsbu:5704: anena cāre vihāre vā sarvatra sarvadā vāsarvajñaceṣṭitasyābhāvāt bhagavataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5706: asarvajño hi kṣīṇakleśo 'py asamudghātitatvād vāsanāyā ekadā bhrāntena hastinā sārdhaṃ samāgacchati bhrāntena rathenety evamādikam asarvajñaceṣṭitaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:5711: abandhyakṛtya satatam asaṃmoṣaḥ namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.55 //
SA20asmahsbu:5712: anena yasya satvasya yo 'rthaḥ karaṇīyo yasmin kāle tatkālānativartanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:5713: abandhyaṃ kṛtyaṃ sadā bhagavata ity asaṃmoṣadharmatvaṃ svabhāvataḥ karmataś ca saṃdarśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5716: mahākaruṇayā yukta hitāśaya namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.56 //
SA20asmahsbu:5717: atra mahākaruṇā bhagavataḥ karmataḥ svabhāvataś ca paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsbu:5718: mahākaruṇayā hi bhagavān ṣaḍkṛtvo rātrindivena lokaṃ pratyavekṣate ko hīyate ko vardhate ity evamādi /
SA20asmahsbu:5719: tadyogāc ca bhagavataḥ sarvasatveṣu nityaṃ hitāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5723: atra cārasasṃ gṛhītaiḥ ṣaḍbhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5727: tadanyasatvottamānām api śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām antikād uttamatvena sarvasatvottamatvaṃ paridīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5733: nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣeti cārasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍāveṇikā buddhadharmā ye buddhasyaiva saṃvidyante nānyeṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5734: nāsti chandaparihāṇir nāsti vīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñāvimuktiparihāṇir ity adhigamasaṃgṛhītāḥ ṣaḍ /
SA20asmahsbu:5736: anāgate pratyutpanne adhvani tathāgatasyāsaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:5740: sarvaṃ vākkarma sarvaṃ manaskarmeti karmasaṃgṛhāitās trayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:5743: sarvatra sarvasatvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.58 //
SA20asmahsbu:5744: anena tribhiś ca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānāc ca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsbu:5745: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogiko nairmāṇikaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:5746: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punar atra sarvasatvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:5749: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te // AMsa_20-21.59 //
SA20asmahsbu:5761: akṣayair asamair yukto guṇair lokeṣu dṛśyase /
SA20asmahsbu:5762: maṇḍaleṣv apy adṛśyaś ca sarvathā devamānuṣaiḥ // AMsa_20-21.61 //
SA20asmahsbu:5770: sarvathā cādṛśyamānatā dharmakāyeneti trividhā prabhedavṛttir iti /
